Reviews.Title: Well designed, lack of Chrome default w/o jailbreaking, no Google Maps, only 1GB memory, false WIFI claims
Reviews.Author: Edwin A. Mcgusty "EddyMac71"
Reviews.Content: As much as I didn't want to buy another iPad for my new tablet, Apple makes great hardware and has a nice, simple, stable operating system.  If they just stuck with that I'd never leave them.  Unfortunately I love my Google also and Apple is pulling an AOL by trying to make its customers be stuck with their apps.  We'll see how that works out for them, but they lost me as an iPhone customer because of it.That's my Apple rant :)  Moving on to the review, the 'new' new IPad, aka iPad 4, is nice and quick!  Had the original iPad and it became obsolete pretty quickly due to the small 256MB of memory - great for a game of freecell, but it couldn't hold more than a few web pages without having to do constant refreshes when you switch tabs, very annoying, hardly ever used it eventually.  Bought an iPad 3 for my girlfriend, she didn't like it and we returned it to buy $100 necklace which she loved.  Almost bought an iPad mini, cute size, then found out Apple only put in 512MB of memory - it can't handle many web pages without doing the annoying refresh thing either - already obsolete when it hit the shelves.  So iPad 4 had the nice high res screen and 1 gig of memory, still only half the 2 gigs that comparable Android tablets have, but that's why we'll all have to buy another tablet in a year or two rather than 3-4 years for any other electronic device - planned obsolescence, slightly annoying also.  I would do a Nexus 7 over the mini, but since I have an Android phone with a nice large screen (which I love compared to my iPhones), a Nexus 7 is too similar.So long story short, I like and use my iPad 4 a lot more than I thought I would, it's still currently the best tablet as of February 2013.  The higher res screen, although not a big difference in the store, is actually really nice once you get used to it.  My MacBook Air looks old now in comparison and I'll have to upgrade that when Apple adds the Retina display on the next generation.  Web pages look great, HD apps are more available now and I even use my iPad to read with the Kindle app ... although I suspect Apple will take that away from you at some point also, ha!  Greedy, oh well.  Best of all the iPad is very quick and has great battery life so far, using mostly for web browsing and not gaming.WIFI claim of double the speed - FALSE.  One of my big factors of getting the iPad was its claim of double the WIFI speeds as I want quick internet browsing.  No one at Apple Store knows how or why it will give you this or whether it will do it without special equipment like a new router.  So here is the deal - the new iPad gets HALF, not double, the WIFI speed of my three year old 2010 MacBook Air on the same (standard 2.4mhz) high speed cable modem WIFI router.  I get about 66Mbps (speedtest.net) on my 2010 MacBook Air and only about 32Mbps on the new iPad.  Tested it every way possible and the results only get worse if you adjust your router settings.  Long story short, you need to get a new dual band (2.4mhz & 5 mhz) router if you want to get the higher claimed speed, but the claimed speed is only in comparison to prior iPads.  Essentially buying a new router and going though the pain of setting that up with your ISP is the only way to get back to the wireless speeds Apple could do three years ago on a standard 2.4mhz WIFI router.  Browsing is fairly quick and will obviously depend on your broadband connection, but to claim double and then not even equal three year old speeds is a little annoying.In conclusion, with all the little issues that Apple makes me not like them as a company, they still do make great hardware and they have a stable operating platform.  If you are looking for a quick, smooth, full size tablet, the new iPad is hard to beat.  We'll see what the rest of 2013 has to bring.  As Android apps convert to full size tablet and HD over time, I think next year Apple will see a lot more competition.  All I want is my Google apps on my iPad, is that too much to ask for to keep me an Apple customer in the future?  Will have to go through the hassle of jailbreaking this to be able to make Chrome my default browser and then Apple will not allow updates, slightly annoying.  But, yes, it's a really nice tablet otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Beware Apple support
Reviews.Author: Rob Haff
Reviews.Content: The ipad is a good product, but beware Apple support if you purchase online!  I believe it's a "dirty little secret"...when you purchase an Apple product on-line...it seems you are treated differently when it comes to support?  You decide....  After recieving my $800 defective Ipad in the mail, I was told by Apple Care on the phone to "go to a store and they'll take care of it", so I did so and drove for an hour to the closest Apple store in Miami.  So believe it or not,  I could not get a repair job OR replacement from that store...or any of the 4 stores in the Miami area!  How could this be I asked???  Maybe because I purchased my ipad from Amazon?  I couldn't get a straight answer from any of the folks at the store but when I asked if they actually did not have an ipad in the store to replace mine, the answer was "warranty replacements come from a different inventory than ones for sale".  And not one store in the greater Miami area had a "Replacement", according to them.  I was told my only option was to go to a UPS store, and mail it via ground to them, and then in a week or so they would send me a "Replacement".  Again, they could not tell me if it would be a new one, or a Refurb.  Very disappointing from one of the most profitable corporations in the world.  If I could do it again, I'd try a Samsung Tab.

Reviews.Title: Too many issues
Reviews.Author: Jason M Parnes
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that the mediocre rating on this product had nothing to do with the seller I went through.  I had several issues with the product when I first received the iPad, starting with a small issue of the home screen button not functioning properly.  This was then compounded into a larger issue by the Apple "genius" not being such of a genius and replacing my iPad with a new ones and not swapping my SIM card (this was after a 3 hour wait at the Apple store).  After several more hours on the phone with both Apple and Verizon, I was finally able to get them to over-night me a new SIM card and thought everything should be fine... wrong.The big issue I am now having is a "No SIM card" error, which I clearly do have as evidenced by the SIM card in my iPad.  I have done some Google searching and have noticed that many others are having the same issue.  My iPad will work great for some time and then give me that error and no longer let me connect to the internet through my Verizon service.All in all, when the iPad is working, its amazing, however when you pay >$700 for an item you expect it to work perfectly without having to lose hours of your time at the Apple store and on the phone.  The customer service Apple has provided to me during this time is also making me rethink my switch to Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product and customer service
Reviews.Author: T. Cambau "snake"
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these and it worked great for 6 months.However it simply died withou reason. Now this should upset most people and frankly I did not like I either. But I went to an apple store and they simple gave me a new one.No questions, no demands for receipts or the original box of the product. Absolutely nothing.That's what I call an amazing customer service!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Comes with a number of iAnnoyances
Reviews.Author: D. Rodrigues "I'd rather be cycling"
Reviews.Content: On the plus side the IPad has a fast charge time, long battery life, good Wi-Fi, a robust cpu, and an excellent display. That said, it's not without some flaws and annoyances. Foremost, there's no consistent method to back navigate. Perhaps, this was one of those cases where design overrules function; in order to keep the device looking elegant they sacrificed functionality. The result is confusion and inconsistency. In some cases you find yourself navigating back via the app itself; however sometimes you need to use the home function or start swiping. For example, at one point I opened a PDF that was attached to an email but then I could not easily find a way to close the PDF to return to the inbox. There's no consistency as to where the back function is to be found or what it may be called. Often you are forced to make reaches across the screen whereas if there was one consistent placement for a back function you always know where it is. The same is true for getting a list of apps running in the background. You are forced to use a awkward four finger up motion.  Why not just give us a consistent button for a list of running apps?  I found the need to use 4 finger swipes annoying.. Another missing function is the cancel key. If you accidentally start to download a huge file and want to abort - where's the key to stop the download?  The app store is annoying as you can't search for apps in ways of your choosing. Why not offer advanced search that would give you some options to sort and filter?  Another issue I have with the device is its dependence on iTunes. Certain files cannot be removed from the device unless you are on iTunes, really? Why? I should be able to delete files off my device. I'm assuming there's an app for doing that but really - why not just make that part of the OS? Speaking of what's not included - why not include a free calculator? Do I really need to shop for a basic calculator? The native Maps app is a work in progress with many roads or local features not labeled correctly. If you want to hook this device to a camera you need to purchase a special adapter but check the reviews for the adapter as many users are reporting it no longer works after the latest OS update. There's no easy way to manage your cookies in safari. In advanced setting you can either delete all cookie data or none.  It has a very nice display however I refuse to adopt Apple marketing speak and call it "retina" display. Don't bother thinking you'll be able to send anything to your printer unless of course you have a specific "air" printer that will work with the Apple iOS. I could go on but hopefully you get the point that this device has both strong and weak points.

Reviews.Title: Great Multipurpose Tablet
Reviews.Author: Student
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. It's not perfect, but considering that I'll have it for at least 2 years and I've used it every day so far, I certainly get my $.40 worth each day! It's very sturdy and I know it will hold up well, as my other Apple products have. I have friends who still use their original iPads (they work just fine, but many applications don't run on the operating system). I have a Kindle (an old version), and still love my Kindle as a reader. It's the only way I can read in the sunlight and it's SO lightweight. Eventually, I'll upgrade to a new Kindle reader, but I see them as having different purposes. The iPad is a mini computer, and the non-Fire Kindle is the equivalent of carrying around a book (or a thousand).iPad 3 vs. iPad 4:I purchased the version right before this one--the iPad 3--several weeks before the announcement of this version. I called Apple a few days after the announcement, and they immediately set me up with a way to return the iPad 3 to repurchase the newest version. I realize that some people were angry about the announcement, but there has to be a cut off date for new technology at some point, and I thought that Apple treated me as well or better than I've seen from any other technology company.Yes, both the iPad 3 and 4 have very crisp, clear screens (which are stunning for video quality compared to my Macbook from 2010). However, the increased speed of the iPad 4 makes the video quality seem clearer. It's difficult to explain, but movies definitely got a bit crisper. Also, the increased speed really is incredible when opening apps and running a lot at once. I'd say the time it takes to open large applications is cut in half. But, I was so impressed with the iPad 3 when it came, and if I hadn't been able to exchange it, I would still give it a 5-star review--it's definitely not "obsolete."Finally, what makes the iPad special? First, no one *needs* one. But now that I have one, it's sure useful and I wouldn't want to go back to life before I got one. Here's why:* I sit at school or at work in front of a computer all day. I am always typing or reading on the screen. Coming come to something different is nice--it's refreshing. I'd rather watch a tv show on a 10" iPad than any other non-TV device (laptop, tablet, phone, etc.). The picture quality is great for movies and browsing, and the 10" screen is big enough to share if a friend and I want to watch something together. A 7" isn't enough for that or big enough to basically serve as a TV replacement.* It is functional enough to REPLACE a computer. Don't get me wrong, I still need my computer for editing files, serious typing, spreadsheets, etc. But right after I got the ipad, I went on a 10-day trip. No computer, no problem. I could take care of all of my emails from work and school, keep in touch, keep up with my finances, etc. It was anything I'd need for a non-work trip. Web browsing works just as well as a laptop for 95% of sites, and there's an app for many that even improves the browsing experience.* Given the first two points, I think owning an iPad will greatly extend the life of my laptop. I probably use my laptop 50% less now that I have an iPad, so I'll probably get an extra year of life out of my laptop as a result. That, in itself, makes the purchase of an iPad worth it in my eyes.* Integration with other Mac devices. This doesn't apply to everyone, but if you're a Mac user for a laptop or an iPhone, I'd highly recommend the iPad over alternatives, even if it's more expensive. If you're hooked on Windows products or Google products, I'd consider those devices.* The number of apps. I know that apps are everywhere these days, but, it seems at least, that there are still the most applications for Apple devices. The difference is especially noticeable in non-retail applications. For example, I've tried dozens of "to do" and organizer apps, and my favorite, Errands, is only available on iOS. Another of my favorites, Fotopedia Heritage (a gorgeous display of UNESCO World Heritage photography), is only on iPad. So far (and this may change), a lot of companies also choose to release new iOS versions of applications first. This edge will decrease with time, but for now it is still a significant "plus" for an iPad over other tablets for those who are into applications. Also, I can run most iPhone apps on the iPad, and there's an easy way to tell the difference (e.g. you can search just for iPad apps or for iPhone/iPad/iPod apps). Not sure if you can do this on other tablets, but I've found it useful (e.g. my bank only has an iphone app, but I can still run it on my iPad). Finally, though, just to be clear, this is NOT just a device for running applications. I could do almost everything I choose to do through applications just by using a web browser.* The number of accessories. Many won't care about this, but some will. If you like to have cases to protect your electronics, the sheer number for iPad is a draw (not a huge one, but the sprinkles on the cake). Everything's out there, from cheap plastic covers to the smart cover (the one that folds as a stand) to professional-looking leather folios to designer soft zip cases. It can be a fashion statement, but it's more likely just a way to make sure to keep your device safe.* Finally, and this may be petty, but it's the most professional device. In the field I know (law), partners at law firms and federal judges use iPads, not other devices to read briefs, send emails, etc. I've never seen anyone doing work on a Kindle device and I've never even seen another tablet in a professional setting. Part of this may be that it's a well-established product, and part may be that the 10-inch screen is nice for reading, even if it's bulkier. Being able to feel comfortable that you can carry your device in a professional environment may matter for some, and the iPad definitely delivers above other devices there.

Reviews.Title: As good as advertised
Reviews.Author: stu
Reviews.Content: Grandma bought this for our Daughter on her Birthday. The IPad 4 is all we were told it was and more. The display is incredible and our daughter is using the education apps to help in school. She loves to read now more then ever. The books and apps we download have increased her love for reading and learning. I think that is the major gift that you really get from Apple. A learning platform for kids as well as a device for adults.If you are an adult and want a device that will increase your child's love for learning, you cant go wrong with this product. Thanks Steve, we miss you.

Reviews.Title: IPad '4' Review (with notes from 3)
Reviews.Author: JBussert
Reviews.Content: If you're still curious about whether an IPad is right for you.. you could probably do best going to all the reviews from the IPad 2 or 3.  Here I am going to talk about what 'new' features you see in the IPad 4 (also called the 'new' IPad).First off.. they don't make the IPad 3 anymore.. when this was created it was immediately a replacement for the IPad 3.  There wasn't a lot of fanfare as this wasn't a huge upgrade over the 3 and was just released with the new IPad Mini.The two main features (for those in the US):- Retina display.. I never thought the display was bad, but this is an improvement.  Compared next to the original IPad 3 there is a difference, albeit not overly noticeable unless you get an app that was made for the retina display (not many out there yet as the product isn't even 30 days old yet).  The glare issue is still there.  If you're using this outside it's basically like looking in the mirror if the sun is at a bad angle. Nothing changed on that front.- Faster speed. Same as above I never thought it was an issue but when using some speed tests it is faster and you'll notice, especially when multitasking, the apps run smoother with less 'hitches'.Also:- Like the IPad Mini and the new phone it has the 8-pin adapter and not the 'old' 30 pin insert.Everything else.. the exact same as the former IPad 3. Battery life is great and while I'm not a 'heavy' user of the IPad (mainly used for web surfing, basic apps, etc..) it fits all of my needs.  Overall, if you have the IPad 3 should you upgrade?  I don't see a major reason unless you're the type that HAS to have the latest and greatest.  I just happened to finally be in the market for one (after years of indifference) and with my roommate having the IPad 3 it was an easy comparison.

Reviews.Title: My first iPad
Reviews.Author: W. Horton "Happy Customer"
Reviews.Content: I spent my entire life in the information tech field. I have never seen a computer that didn't arrive with an instruction manual. The iPad is SO intuitive, one isn't needed!I love it ! The iPad can do literally anything and it is totally amazing! Before you consider one of the many clones, tablet pc's, or W8 computers, Please take a look at the iPad. I am so happy that I popped for the extra $100 to get the iPad 4.

Reviews.Title: Ipad known issue - fix is $300
Reviews.Author: Jason W. Demuth
Reviews.Content: I purchased an iPad3 on launch day - waited in line and everything.  This was our 3rd iOS device and was my children's iPad.  Basically from day 1 they loaded up the iPad with apps of all sort, so much so that there was not enough space to get updates.  They have periodically come to me to complain about lack of wifi connectivity, I usually restarted the device and most of the time it would connect (for a time at least).  I assumed this was some sort of a software issue that would be corrected when I upgraded.  So I finally wiped off the iPad and upgraded and have only had a greyed out  wifi on switch.  We live in the great midwest nowhere close to an apple store.  I finally made a trip to Des Moines IA to take to the apple store there for service.  It is a wifi ant problem (a known issue) and the fix involved $300 to upgrade.  It is certainly my fault for not believing my kids or investigating the issue sooner.  The apple store is so well advertised as the place to go to get apple products fixed I wrongly assumed this was my only option.If this were any other sort of problem (bluetooth issue, cracked screen etc) I would expect that to be a reasonable option for an out of warranty issue - but with a known problem?  Microsoft generated so much goodwill by fixing their known hardware issue no matter when purchased, why can' apple at least match the customer service of MSFT?  I am just asking for my kid's ipad to be fixed so they can continue to use and purchase apps.Don't make me call the tech guy to complain - THIS IS A KNOWN ISSUE, I am just asking for Apple to take their billions of dollars and not stick it to a Dad trying to get his kids an iPad - does that seem unreasonable?Jason Demuthjasondemuth@hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Weber "Pete Weber"
Reviews.Content: the iPad Mini is a great tool for me -- lightweight, takes up little space, yet powerful. With its 64 GB capacity, it can do just about anything!

Reviews.Title: Love. Love everything about it!
Reviews.Author: J. Culver "JCulver"
Reviews.Content: It is an Apple. Does all that goes with that name. Excellent product!The retina display is as clear as a picture could be, amazing. Very quick response time. The new processor is lightning fast!

Reviews.Title: Switched from Android and glad I did
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: I had the Motorola Xoom prior to purchasing the iPad. I switched to Apple because the Xoom was getting slow, unresponsive, etc. I'm very happy with the iPad - so much so that I'm going to switch to all Apple products over my pc and android phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Present for Mom
Reviews.Author: Katarahh
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother because she was always complaining that the laptop she had was too heavy and made her lap hot, etc.  I was afraid she might have trouble using this iPad because she is a little (no, really a lot) tech challenged and has problems learning new things at age 82.  However, she began using the iPad immediately after it arrived (lightning quick shipping btw) and has loved it from the very beginning.  She takes it to her bedroom, to the kitchen, out on the patio--basically everywhere she goes!  I had expected weeks of trying to teach her how to use it but she picked up on it quickly during the first few hours and has had NO problems.  She's happy.  And when she's happy and busy on the iPad, I'm happy!  I highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: The iPad is NOT a PC
Reviews.Author: Derald Glidden
Reviews.Content: The iPad is a great machine, but it's not a PC, and it's hard to get used to that fact. It's great for taking on vacation, but for every day use, it's mostly just a toy--as all tablets are.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Roy
Reviews.Content: It's not only working find, but also unbelievable condition. I bought this about 2 month ago, I don't have any problem so far. Great price and great condition. I'm totally satisfied with this item!

Reviews.Title: iPad 4th Generation..Simply The Best!
Reviews.Author: J's_Amazon_Reviews
Reviews.Content: How could I have lived without an iPad 4th generation before?! I love..no I LOVE this iPad! One of the best investments I ever purchased.It's F A S T! Best part is I can sit with my feet up while another family member uses the desktop PC.The convenience of taking this with me while traveling is outstanding. There's so many wi-fi spots where I live.The iPad 4 takes better pictures than when I used a 35mm or currently digital camera. The clarity is 110% with automatic focus adjustment.Thank you Apple for making the iPad, I'm a fan for life.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4 128gb with Cellular
Reviews.Author: ahp999
Reviews.Content: First off this is a great product and has endless things you can do for productivity and for fun. Second I did not buy this product from Amazon because of two reasons, 1. At the time when I was ready to purchase the 128gb cellular version it was going for a 1000 dollars plus on this website, when apple stores and bestbuy stores were selling this for $929 plus tax. 2. Some of the reviews suggested the seller was actually sending people used iPads when paying clearly buying "new" products.Anyways, I love it, its fast, easy to use. You get what you basically put into it, the app store is amazing with so many things that make this ipad great. I can not believe I did not own one sooner.The only thing I can not figure out how to do is, is be able to send multiple attachments within a email. I hope some new application or apple fixes this issue. Its easy to do one at a time, but its not efficient. It seems like a common problem and question that is asked i noticed when googling this issue.My iPad has had none of the issues addressed earlier. It gets great wifi signal all the time and the 3G works great also. I am glad I got this instead of a Android based Tablet.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Escott
Reviews.Content: In the family we have the iPad, Kindle fire, Samsung Galaxy and Goggle Nexus 7 tablets. So having used all four brands here is my take on the iPad.Pros:Very fast.Excellent for surfing the web and navigating around apps.User friendly.Very Good battery life.Malware free worries.Good speaker volumes.Good for game apps.Bluetooth.Even pixation.Plenty of accessories online for it.Front and back cameras.Cons:Not the best Colors even with retina display. I wish that they were as vivid as Kindle fire HD for video streaming.Screen loves fingerprints.Cost more.Does not support SD memory card (Only Samsung Galaxy does of the four brands that I have used).Costly brand power adapter.Does not use a universal power adapter like all the other brands. You can not use a universal usb micro cable to charge it from your laptop. You are sucked into buying a new brand adapter, if you forget the brand power adapter at home on a trip.Unlike the other brand tablets, you can not recharge the Ipad with a universal cigarette power adapter from your car or with a universal usb micro cable connected to your laptop.As it is the tablet is already costly enough, why make more money from users if they forget their power adapter?Recommend for surfing the web or using game apps.Not the best for online video streaming. Kindle Fire beats them all for online streaming of videos.Recommend the following products:1.ZAGGKeys PROfolio+ Bluetooth Keyboard for iPAD Gen 4.2.Skinomi TechSkin ultraclear screen protector for iPAD Gen 4.

Reviews.Title: Nice buy
Reviews.Author: Sablerose
Reviews.Content: This iPad has some nice features. The ability to write notes on some documents has really made a difference for my side business. Battery time is long enough to get about any task completed.

Reviews.Title: Before I had an iPad, I had a smartphone, a Kindle DX, and a computer. I cannot imagine NOT having the iPad now.
Reviews.Author: Rosie Riveter
Reviews.Content: My iPad uses wireless which means that it can only connect when I am in an area with wireless. Nevertheless, because I have access to wireless at home and at work, this little device has taken the place of my smartphone and an additional laptop I used at work.Why? The functionality of the iPad 4 on wireless only is absolutely sufficient for my use. If I need to use the iPad outside of a wireless network I have sufficient storage to save up to 64G of music, videos or audiobooks for that use. When I am online, this device works perfectly for email and internet surfing.I use it at work for email that I cannot access on my work computer and at home for reading, audiobooks, and games when I am away from my home computer. The display is all it is advertised as being - crisp, high definition - and the apps available to me are more sufficient.At home, with its wireless connection I can "read in bed," play games, catch up on emails, use the device as an alarm clock... if I think of something I need to look up in the middle of the night I can look it up on this device ... so it is a VERY handy tool and entertainment vehicle.I am pretty sure that other tablets can provide similar uses... and possibly at lesser cost That said, the retina display and the Apple reputation (I am admittedly an Apple user at home and a Windows system user at work) are impressive, and worth the cost as far as I am concerned.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: dbarb
Reviews.Content: I love the Apple iPad! I replaced a laptop and especially like the lighter weight and to date have been able to do everything I could do on the laptop on the iPad! Much easier to travel with too!

Reviews.Title: Amazing clarity
Reviews.Author: big lar "creative thinker"
Reviews.Content: This iPad is simply amazing,the picture it is so clear. The controls are all very convenient. I like all the features it has too. Just another great apple product. I have a iMac  too. This is just for traveling with me everywhere I go. It matches up with my iMac and my iPhoneyou could say we are an apple family except I also have two laptops that are not apple. I enjoy computers and the technology they bring.

Reviews.Title: Good hardware, good apps availability, but still quite not there
Reviews.Author: Nando
Reviews.Content: You need to invest heavily in the apple ecosystem to really enjoy the iPad. Basic requirements of music/video playback, or pdf/ebook (personal collection) reading out of the box is non existent. That along with a mere 16gb of storage does make this still a purchase worth thinking twice about. And to top it all the memory increment is exorbitantly overpriced, especially looking at the contemporary SD/microSD card prices. Apple still continues to rake in moolah just by flaunting their brand, though the reliability of the same is increasingly deteriorating.

Reviews.Title: Love it, BUT.....
Reviews.Author: Bee bishop
Reviews.Content: I had an issue with the lightening cable.  It broke off inside the tablet.  After research, this happens more often than you think.  Apple does not cover under warranty and considers it "abuse" which it was not!!!  They wanted $299 to give me another device at the Apple Store I took it to.  I called Apple Support they told the store to give me another one at "no cost".  I think there is a flaw in the design of the charging cable so be very careful when using it to charge your iPad and if this happens to you, do what I did and ask for an exception.  Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Cheep er is not better ///////
Reviews.Author: D.M.F
Reviews.Content: In all the time dealing with amazon  and there servers I have not had any thing that up set me as this one done .I  received the I PAD and opened it and the next day started to set up. it did not want to take my wifi or numbers. I was tired so stoped and fineshed  the next day .It did not give me any up set at this timeWas going to listen  to  an audio book and it worked fine for about an HR..then it went to MUTE. I thought I had touched some thing so re hit sound ,it stared  to play and as I put it down went MUTE again an I re set again--------Got in touch with Amazon -servers help with me and seller. Seller  advised that  as it had broke the seal .they would not take it back.talked to amazon server and end result  got APPLE number .Apple helped me reset the thing and re asureds  they would help. ..with the two Comp.I have 2 ways to go .as  I really do not trust the I PAD and the seller has agreed to take it back with AMAZONS  help .get money refunded  an go with another server , or Apple  even with the en cress  . Trust Amazon to get it done an Apple to stand behind what they sell .It  will take a little longer before I get the I pad I wanted . But I feel saferTHANK YOUMrs  Foster

Reviews.Title: An excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Dennis S. Obrien "DSOB"
Reviews.Content: Having had two iPad 2s in the past, as well as an iPad Mini, I was very familiar with the operation of the earlier models.  I was very satisfied with the speed of the processors in this model and the Retina Display was outstanding.  I didn't need the improved imaging, as the displays in the earlier models were quite nice, and i don't do a lot of graphics work, but when photos were brought up they were quite impressive.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Choice Available; Love the Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Travis Starnes
Reviews.Content: It is not new at all to say this, but having tried several tablets out there this is the one to use.  While I am not crazy with some of the changes in iOS7, that is just software which can be, and hopefully will be, fixed.  Battery life is bar none the best I have seen, available apps are unexpectedly abundant and for the most part quality.I use mine for reading and a lot of video, and the new display is excellent.  Very easy to read with no eye strain and video looks amazing.  Which is quite the compliment considering I usually get standard definition and not high definition video, so even at the worst quality it still looks great.If you want a tablet device, go with the iPad.  Its worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Del W.
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad mini!  This is the first time I have every bought a Apple product.  Works great and is the perfect compact size.  I see why there is so much hype with Apple products.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad - Great Product, good value.
Reviews.Author: UT
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister's 70th birthday - and she loves it, of course.  Who wouldn't?  The retina display is amazingly clear for older eyes, and the Apple product simply works, as they advertise.  Now, she can surf while watching the tube; take pictures of her garden and post to FB, browse the net, or play games.  Apple is the best at this.

Reviews.Title: I love it. I love it. I love it.
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Raymond
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure that I would like any Apple product after hearing many of my friends complain about their experiences but after I bought my first iPhone earlier this year, purchasing the iPad was a no-brainer. It acts just like my iPhone, only with a bigger, brighter screen which makes playing my games so much better. I have already purchased 9 different games for it because it has so much space left after importing all of my music, pictures, and movies. Since I received it last week, I still haven't been able to put it down. I guess they fixed the map app since I haven't had any serious issues with using it. Overall, a very satisfying experience. Thanks!!!!

Reviews.Title: So convenient!
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: I am always on the go and spend a lot of time with my brother who is legally blind.  He has a lot of doctor appointments and I do a lot of waiting.  I take my iPad and fill the time reading, watching TV shows, or playing games.  Unless you have spent a lot of time in waiting rooms, you would not understand what a blessing this is.

Reviews.Title: Why I didn't buy it before?
Reviews.Author: Lemarfi
Reviews.Content: Great, beautiful, useful, very smart! I have to say that everybody should have a iPad, mainly if it is Retina's display! Very satisfied, I feel very modern since it is very quickly to run and to use to study and work! Great!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Fast processor, better graphics and video than my 1st generation ipad. I highly recommend buying this version of the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Apple
Reviews.Author: Simeon Lamar Fowler
Reviews.Content: Most things I find about Apple they work the first time, No need to keep trying to download things, Much much faster connection. Battery life great may need to charge every three days. Don't like not being able to text message people without apple devices.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: James Snow
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed everything the iPad does all the functions great, got here on time and overall just a good machine

Reviews.Title: Like Brand New. Just as described.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great transaction. Fast shipping. Would recommend to a friend. The price is higher than a Kindle Fire because it is a higher quality product.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display - Black
Reviews.Author: Janit Satterfield
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I wanted at a great price.  I also received it in just a few days in its original packaging.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4th Gen Pretty cool!
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I have just started using my first tablet. So far, I am really impressed with all the business, education, and entertainment applications available. The 9.7 retina display gives you a super clear view that is better than anything viewed on my laptop.

Reviews.Title: love my ipad
Reviews.Author: Patricia Wellman
Reviews.Content: This thing does so much more than i ever dreamed it would .  I am just learning to use it and I know it does so much more than I can even realize.  I am glad  I got it

Reviews.Title: Screen color off
Reviews.Author: G. Wesley Aven
Reviews.Content: Have done photography and color correction for 30 years.  This screen color is extremely greenish yellow.  I own an Ipad 2, wife has an IPad mini, father in law has an Ipad 2, both my daughters have Ipad minis, syster has an Ipad 4 and this is by far the worst color of any that I have seen.  I am afraid Apples quality control is slipping since Steve Jobs passed away.  This is a common problem with the newer iPads from what I read on the internet.

Reviews.Title: Nice Buy!
Reviews.Author: Louis S. Morello
Reviews.Content: This outstanding iPad is a gift for my 84 year old father who just loves it.  Easy to use and he can take it from room to room to use it in his own comfort.  I recommend getting the iPad for Seniors or Dummies book to go along with it because it will help you tremendously.

Reviews.Title: IPad vs Samsung Galaxy
Reviews.Author: norma wood
Reviews.Content: I ordered Samsung Galaxy Tab.  Could not download movies from Amazon because unit needed flash player and flash player no longer on mobile devices.  Spent 2 weeks trying to get Google Play Store perk - never did get it. Assume support would be same.... So returned it to amazon & got Apple iPad.  I absolutely love it.  Have downloaded movies. & books.  Was so surprised & pleased with ease of learning a new system - I'd never operated an Apple. I can even print pictures from iPad.  A really amazing device.  I chatted with support re how to set up groups in contacts.  Patrick at Apple was fantastic.  Gave the link for group instructions which I printed right from the iPad.  It was a great experience with support. I HIGHLY recommend iPad.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Mary Mistretta
Reviews.Content: Very pleasedvwith its functionality.This was a gift for my twin brother who is mentakky handicapped. I was able to download appropriate games for him to play. Also teaching him to use facetime. He loves the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Anna Carter
Reviews.Content: It arrived really fast, even before the expected arrival date.  The only problem I had is they would not ship to Alaska.  It was a gift for my daughter and she lives in Alaska.  We had to mail it there after it came here.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: kay crofoot
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this IPad! Bought my first one in October and this one for my sister's retirement!! She loves hers as well. Your service is outstanding!!! Awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Upgrade from iPad 2!
Reviews.Author: Hector F.
Reviews.Content: Sold my iPad 2 back to Amazon, and was debating between this iPad (64GB) 4th Gen or the new iPad Air. From what I seen on reviews they are basically the same except for size and weight difference. While this iPad is a little on the heavy side, it is definitely a lot faster than my previous iPad 2 and the retina display is awesome! Not too mention I kept the same cases from iPad 2.

Reviews.Title: My only regeat is not buy one years ago.
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: Great! First apple product I've own, the voice command is perfect for us visually gifted folk. My only regeat is not buy one years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Corey Davis
Reviews.Content: Excellent, practically looks brand new. Haven't had any problems with it so far. No scratches on the screen or on the back of the IPad. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Very easy
Reviews.Author: Stacie L. Helsing "stacielc"
Reviews.Content: Significant speed increase over iPad 2.  Significant resolution improvement.  Has excellent build feel and old cases work perfectly on it :-)

Reviews.Title: Recommend highly
Reviews.Author: Judy Cooley
Reviews.Content: This was the best purchase I have made. I love love love it. The price was absolutely perfect, I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Karla Hein
Reviews.Content: Love the ipad. Just like my phone. Hated the kindle. Different processor. It was fast but nothing I was used to

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Savage
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted one and it's exactly what I wanted.I rated it a 5 star because I love it.I would recommend it to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: My kids love it.
Reviews.Author: stumpedI
Reviews.Content: I got one for each kid.  My daughter seems to have been acquired by the device.  Like trapper keeper in southpark, or like brain slugs in futurama.  You cannot find my daughter without this device.  She absolutely loves it.  The screen is small but it has higher resolution than my 42 inch monitor.  It is an impressive screen.  I bought a laptop for portability.  I didn't know what portability was till i used one of these devices.  I got the kids one each (2 kids) now i want one.  Just not sure i can bring myself to spend 600 dollars on myself.  If you can get over how these things are made this is a nice product.  These are NOT made in America.  These are quality products but.... why is my conscious bothering me?

Reviews.Title: Love the updates
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I went from the original Ipad to this model and it's an incredible difference. I was convinced that I no longer needed an ipad at all as I never used mine anymore, but my wife needed one to use at work and we went with this most recent model. The resolution is incredible, very lightweight, and so much quicker than the original... Now I want one for myself while she's using hers for work!

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad
Reviews.Author: Marge25 "Marge25"
Reviews.Content: I own an android phone and now the iPad.I will say there are a few features on my android I miss terribly on the iPad, like the swipe feature.Other than that, the tablet is fast and reliable.  The entire family is enjoying it for various functions.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Tahnee9295
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item assuming it would come in less than par condition. I was wrong. Even though the description said "used", it was much better. There wasn't a single scratch nor dent on the screen or outer casing. Although, the shipping took a week and I half I realize that is out of the sellers control. 10/10 would buy from again.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves her new ipad
Reviews.Author: penny29p
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife so she could use it at her university. Works perfectly to take class notes and play games. I don't use it much but she seems to like it a lot so 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: nats
Reviews.Content: I had the first ipad and loved it. I didn't really have any complaints, but decided to try the new one. Wow. Smaller, light and faster. How can one complain

Reviews.Title: So far I like it. Still learning to use it right now.
Reviews.Author: William C Bell
Reviews.Content: So far I like it. I am still learning to use it right now. I'm 73 and this is the first ipad I have ever owned. I don't even have an iphone.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Karen L. Malin "Cougar64"
Reviews.Content: Husband needed for work.  Sysco Systems foods used this product and it helps my Chef husband get his ordering, inventory, and food costs in quick order.

Reviews.Title: Gift for Wife
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: My wife had seen an iPad and, being a painter, liked the graphics apps that were available for it, so since it was her birthday...  She loves it and now does everything on it... email, graphics, etc.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: pjdurrose "Pam"
Reviews.Content: I waited for a long time before I got an iPad. I prefer the larger over the mini. It's much easier to use the keyboard. I am having a blast with this. I have no technological jargon to fill you in on. It's just pure fun!

Reviews.Title: Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: Boss Lady "DeeDee"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the item in early August of this year and I must say I have not been disappointed. I have never owned the original iPad so will have nothing to which to compare. However, this device has met most of my expectations and I love the ease of carrying it around. I say "most" because I realized it didn't come with a calculator like my Iphone. No big deal! I simply went into the app store and installed a free one on the device. Problem solved!! I am also delighted with the fact that I can surf the Internet and read my Kindle books at the same time. It's quick and very user-friendly. I'd say it's a sound investment.

Reviews.Title: I just love Apple
Reviews.Author: William J.
Reviews.Content: I just love Apple so much so that I just couldn't have gone for any other make. It's just flawless.

Reviews.Title: Who Doesn't Love iPads?
Reviews.Author: AlwaysUpToSomething
Reviews.Content: Seriously, this thing is SO MUCH fun!!  No complaints whatsoever!There's a bit of a learning curve, but having had an iPhone for a couple of years, it was an easy transition, since they both work basically the same way.  Even if it's your first Apple product ever, you will not regret it and will learn all the ins and outs very quickly!Love the way I can go from the couch to bed to the kitchen.. anywhere really.. and never have to stop in the middle of what I'm doing!Absolutely recommend this to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with Amazon
Reviews.Author: Leisa I. Oiterong-Lewis
Reviews.Content: This is a good buy, I have another generation iPad and it's the same, but the quality of picture is nice.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Janice Smolinski "lost police"
Reviews.Content: Was wondering if I would be able learn everything I need on the iPad, and now I can,t put it down.

Reviews.Title: Great Product and Seller
Reviews.Author: Tim E.
Reviews.Content: I recieved this product quite quickly.  It's the exact same as buying a new one with one diffrence, it doesn't cost as much.  Zero scratches or flaws on it.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad!
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: Everything I was expecting and more. I made the mistake of purchasing a Kindle Fire last year. Apps are limited and it appeared that the ones they did have were not as good as the same apps made for Apple products, like my iPhone.The graphics on these iPads are simply amazing! The processor is much faster than my girlfriend's iPad 2. I've owned it for less than one week but love it thus far.Oh, and I have not had ANY problems with WiFi connectivity issues whatsoever. I am guessing and hoping that they have since corrected that problem. I would highly recommend purchasing one of these if you are looking for the best tablet available, in my opinion. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: New iPad User
Reviews.Author: Ed442
Reviews.Content: I never thought I could be "hooked" so quickly.  The ease of retrieving email, sending messages, ordering books for my Kindle, searching for info from wherever I happen to be has been so much fun.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Jerome C. Blair
Reviews.Content: This one is the real deal. Good for everything. Amazing screen. Youtube videos come alive and surfing the internet is easier than ever.....

Reviews.Title: A little piece of heaven in tablet form.
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Madigan "Tommi2toes"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, i'am 66 years old and just love using the I-pad. The pictures you can take with it are super great. Very easy to type, no need for external key board.

Reviews.Title: I bought the best and am glad
Reviews.Author: Carolyn B. Rzewski
Reviews.Content: It does everything ne I wanted it to do. It was easy to set up and download the apps. I really like Siri which works well.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: seacaptain
Reviews.Content: Pros: Excellent battery life and incredible screen. Great sound quality.Cons: could benefit with a mini-usb port and a larger hard drive

Reviews.Title: iPad is great, charger was defective
Reviews.Author: J. B. Fiedler
Reviews.Content: iPad was great but the end of the cable that fit into the iPad to charge it had literally been crushed. There was nothing to fit into the iPad for charging. I had to go out and buy a new cable. And,  yes the box was sealed and wrapped with the ruined cable in it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: MARTIN
Reviews.Content: This product was a great deal of satisfaction to me. The tools it has is very useful as for work as for entairtainment as well.

Reviews.Title: Crisp, beautiful Retina display
Reviews.Author: D. Hongo
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, intuitive, and well designed.  The Retina display is stunning.  You'll want a protective case and some screen protectors to keep your iPad looking fresh.

Reviews.Title: Works well but wireless reception is more than pitiful
Reviews.Author: Chirper "Chirper1962"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone4, Macbook Pro, and the latest iPad. The MacBook Pro has a pretty darned good wireless card. The iPhone 4 and the iPad are pretty ridiculous, and very disappointing. I would not have bought the iPad if I had known it was so poor. If they can't do any better, I think they will lose market share to competitors. Love my Apple devices, but you gotta be able to pick up a wireless signal!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Russell H. Fleming "russellf"
Reviews.Content: I continue to be amazed. I did have an ASUS Transformer Prime TF201. Apple is clearly a better tablet. It is so smooth and well designed. I now plan to purchase my next phone from Apple.

Reviews.Title: Worth the upgrade
Reviews.Author: MasterReviewer05
Reviews.Content: This iPad is definitely the best tablet to date. This is such a huge upgrade from the last iPad 2. It's retina display looks absolutely incredible. There is so much media available on the iTunes Store and there is so much you can do on an iPad. Being able to check emails without the need for glasses is a huge plus. I love this iPad and I'm using it to write this review right now in such a stunning display. I recommend this to you all day.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Peter B. Jones "peterbj7"
Reviews.Content: Superb hardware, my only gripe is the "OK" mono speaker.  iOS is a constant irritant to me, totally Apple, they dictate to the user what they can and can't do or view on the machine.  Luckily 2rd party suppliers have produced software to compensate, and with that software iOS becomes usable.  I eagerly await someone producing an OS for this device that really exploits its capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever
Reviews.Author: stephen p brazzale
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough about my new I pad did not realize what I could do with it , I find myself using all the time problem is I can't put it down getting some grief from my wife but I will deal with it

Reviews.Title: New ipad
Reviews.Author: lala "lala"
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad! Never owned one before and was skeptical in buying one. There doesn't seem to be a lot of information out there on what exactly you can do with an iPad, but I decided to buy it anyway and I am not disappointed. There are many wonderful free apps available and am very happy about that. So far so good am happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: liv "photofan"
Reviews.Content: I am using my iPad every day and hardly ever have had any problem with it. The only drawbacks I see is that it doesn't support software like the Flash player so there are things I can't do with it, and the fact that it doesn't have any USB port or memory card slots (I like to upload my photos and some files).I still need my computer for certain things, so it does not substitute a computer. But it is easy to take with me, for traveling it is great, and it does most of the things I need.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Tablet - review from an Apple Hater
Reviews.Author: David Kalish
Reviews.Content: Ok, here's the deal, I'm not a big fan of Apple.  I think that they use proprietary features and lock out very helpful items (like expansion cards and user-changeable batteries).  In fact, the biggest reason that Apple Fanboys tout their products is that they are user-friendly - and I find that ridiculous - iTunes is one of the WORST software interfaces I've ever seen - it's incredibly difficult to get it to do what you want.  And I've never been a fan of the iDevices either.Until today.  My incredibly generous girlfriend got me an iPad for my Birthday, and I am truly blown away by its ease of use (for the most part - some settings are really buried, or in non-intuitive locations), its tight form factor, its unbelievable battery life, and it's unparalleled apps and games.After only a few weeks, I find that it is my go to device for checking email, social media, gaming, and gathering information.  Even writing documents is easy because of Siri and it's impressive voice recognition.I still wish it had an SD card or expansion slot, but I really can't complain too much.  It really is an incredible device.

Reviews.Title: Palpably faster than iPad 3
Reviews.Author: MasonStorm
Reviews.Content: I see that many excellent reviews about this iPad have already been entered, so I just want to point out the one thing that is most salient to me.  I've owned each of the iPads (1, 2, 3, & mini) and just received this one.  It is very obviously faster than iPad 3!  I cannot believe the number of "professional" reviewers on tech sites stating that they didn't really notice any difference.I was enraptured when I first obtained iPad 3, and felt at the time that the retina display ticked off my last "needs" box as far as tablet computing.  But as I lived with it, it became annoying waiting on its A5X to scroll in a dense webpage ----- daily so.  And the internet browsing experience is the real reason to consider upgrading to the 4 from the 3; it really is that much better.  To use one of my favorite iDevice information websites as an example, go to www.imore.com on the iPad 3, and observe the staccato, stop-and-go browsing experience as you navigate down the page.  Now, do the same on the iPad 4; it's smooth as silk.I'll still be looking for the retina iPad mini when it arrives (looks like 2014 at this rate), but other than the slight heaviness of this iPad 4, I'm completely satisfied.  Noting the never-ending march to smaller-thinner-and-lighter-yet-longer-battery-life, it's difficult to see what Apple can do to improve upon this one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: banda
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet! I chose to purchase the wifi iPad as I use it primarily from home and was not too thrilled with paying AT&T; even more money :). It has worked out perfectly, as most places have free wifi anyway. I also purchased an air printer for my iPad so I rarely need may lap top. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Norma H. Johnston
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting an iPad since it is smaller than a laptop and easier to take everywhere. I still use my laptop the most but once I get used to the iPad that will probably change. I do wish there had been an owners manual with it (paper version) and I'm sure there are a lot of things I could be doing with it that I don't know how. I will learn in time though.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4 replacing Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Vera Cousins
Reviews.Content: I am still in the learning curve but I think I will love it. The Kindle Fire had been adequate until I lost Wi-Fi access at a place where I spend a lot of time. I needed to be able to buy my own data time, which this iPad does. I have had some trouble finding some apps I want in the App store, even though I know they exist (my friend has them)..

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Dennis F. Smallen
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and so far they are great! Wish they were a little cheaper, but you get what you pay for!Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Tonya Bigelow
Reviews.Content: I have two Kindles and didn't know for sure if I would use the iPad, but oh was I wrong!  I love it more and moreas we get to know one another!!  It has been easy to use, just as the Kindle was.  Things are much better andbetter for my eyes and that is a very good thing!  At first it kept slipping out of my hands and then I got smart andput it in the case that I got with the bundle and it is wonderful to use.  I love it and know as I get to know moreabout it, I will only love it more!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Christopher Pipe
Reviews.Content: Overall, very pleased to own the item. Drawbacks: a little heavier than I was expecting. The battery takes a long time to recharge.Hence, 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Ipad still feels best of the tablets
Reviews.Author: M. Green
Reviews.Content: It's surprisingly productive, not just a toy as some have said. Next time I would probably get the version with cell service not just wifi.  There are times, when traveling where it would be better to have all the time Internet connectivity and not have to hunt around for a wifi hotspot. Or definitely purchase mobile hotspot service if you get this model. This model doesn't have built in GPS like cellular model. That means if you plan on using this for GPS on the go, then you must purchase a separate gps to plug in (80-90$) and also pay for mobile wifi. So if you plan to use gps function, might be more cost effective to pay a little more up front for cellular version to save in added cost and inconvenience of hooking up this model for GPS use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Daniel Dziubczynski
Reviews.Content: Had it for over a month and so far it exceeds expectations.  The speed is great, wifi connection good, and the retina display is jaw-droppingly beautiful.  Wish the battery lasted longer but charging it is no problem.  Other thing is my Brother printer isn't a compatible "airprinter", which is a downer, but not a huge deal as I don't need to print directly much.  Web browsing is fun, iMessage replaces texting from my cell phone (saving me $$), and streaming videos is a joy.  This is my first tablet and I couldn't be happier.  Oh yeah, I got the 16gb and it fills up fast.. Do yourself a big favor and get at least 32gb, I wish I did.

Reviews.Title: Best iPad Yet!
Reviews.Author: John Ranelletti
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet with a retina display screen! The larger memory and faster speed are worth the upgrade. Very highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Apple the Best of the Best.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Piedra
Reviews.Content: This iPad, its so wonderful, powerful and amazing. everything is great, the display, the app store, its really strong, and so useful. i love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice improvement from the iPad 2
Reviews.Author: unicorn "ljwachter"
Reviews.Content: I just bought the iPad 4 to replace the iPad 2 since my kids were using the 2 so much and I was tired of hounding them for it.  I'm very happy with the upgrades.  Like with my old iPad I'm basically using it to surf the net, watch streaming videos/podcasts, and read books.  I don't take pictures with it or store music.  I'm also not a gamer - so I can't comment that much on the retina display - but I will say the colors are brighter and I find it easier to read books.  The big difference that I notice is in the processor.  Even with my crappy internet connection I notice a huge improvement in the speed with opening apps and streaming videos.  Battery life is longer than the iPad 2. However, because the battery is bigger on this device it takes a lot longer to charge.  I like to kill the batteries on all my electronic devices before I charge them and from a dead battery to 100% charge on this iPad it took over 8 hours to fully charge.  I wasn't using it when it was charging.  In fact, I read on a couple of review sites that this iPad will continue to charge up to 2 hours after it says it's fully charged.  My advice is to allow yourself extra time and charge it overnight if you can.All in all I'm very happy with it.  Since I carry it with me everywhere I bought the OtterBox Defender Series Case with Screen Protector and Stand for the New iPad (4th Generation), iPad 2 and 3 - Pink Alpenglow for extra protection.  It does add some weight to this tablet but I like the security of knowing it will survive a fall if I drop it.

Reviews.Title: My users love them...
Reviews.Author: James McNeese
Reviews.Content: I have several users that I purchased the new iPad for, and they absolutely love them.  The devices were easy to order and they were delivered on time.  I got them up and running in a very short time!!!

Reviews.Title: Brilliant display and speed.
Reviews.Author: Eran Kemp "Eran S. Kemp"
Reviews.Content: This product is absolutely great.  The display is the best I've ever seen, and the speed is faster than my desktop computer.  The only thing I was not happy with is the PRICE.  However, sometimes you have to pay for advanced quality, and I still think it was worth the expense.  My wife is thrilled with her iPad and not found a hiccup yet.

Reviews.Title: 128gb Ipad
Reviews.Author: Al Rittenhouse
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her Ipad and this one has enough storage for her to do anything. This one replaces a 16gb pad and I received great service from Amazon. Thanks Al

Reviews.Title: Love the Retina Display!
Reviews.Author: Karen Lutz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because of the clarity and the Retina display and I love Apple products. L2D2 delivered it timely and was packaged to protect the item. I'm enjoying it and was thrilled too that I was able to use my ThankYou Points through Amazon, lucky me!Apple iPad with Retina Display MD513LL/A (16GB, Wi-Fi, White) NEWEST VERSION

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: Fox
Reviews.Content: Best purchase I've made this year.  I have researched tablets for a while now and, without going into much detail, the ipad is definitely the best to date.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Great, fast, easy to use - thousands of Apps that install within seconds. Very happy with it and can recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Best iPad Yet
Reviews.Author: Jason Gladstone
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad and it's the best yet. The faster processor is fantastic and the graphics are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Las Vegas
Reviews.Author: Burim Sadriu
Reviews.Content: Iped 4 I love it! I never thought I'm gonna like it like that, thank you amazone.I would reccomend this product to all

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: C. Shultz
Reviews.Content: You get an IPAD 4 for the price of an IPAD 3 with this Retna upgrade....I bought this with 128GB..... 3 year SquareTrade full (DROP/SPILL ON IT THEY REPAIR IT warrenty) for less then the AppleCare price with does not include D/S warrenty....so well worth the price....

Reviews.Title: Once again this iPad out shines all the others.
Reviews.Author: lego-man2
Reviews.Content: This does all it says and out shines my iPad 2 . After looking around for sometime for the right price, this was a great find.

Reviews.Title: Great to FaceTime grandchildren!
Reviews.Author: Marie Baran
Reviews.Content: I love it,  I bought it to FaceTime my grandchildren,  my old iPad didn't have the camera,  it is very similar to my old one, but the graphics are better

Reviews.Title: How do people live without an Ipad
Reviews.Author: Devois007
Reviews.Content: This is the single greatest tech gadget we own. It's everything you'd ever want in one device and so simple to operate thanks to apple technology. I recommend springing for the extra GB though as if you like to load it with movies for the kiddo, it can fill up fast.

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: 4Hand
Reviews.Content: Just like everyone else, I love the Ipad.  It is heavier than I expected, and I was concerned about keeping safe until I got a case for it.  Now I can take it along with no worries.

Reviews.Title: No comments about this product
Reviews.Author: Augusto Ferreira
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Simply sensational. I recommend Apple Inc. products. High quality and functional. This product met my expectations and good-looking.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this is my new baby! IT was received timely and with no issues! If your looking for one then I would recommend!

Reviews.Title: earned its top spot on the list
Reviews.Author: bladeou812
Reviews.Content: Pros:- brilliant screen- exceptional battery life (double the capacity of the 1st Gen Xoom tablet)- flawless software interoperability with over 60 installed apps from the marketplace- seamless integration with iTunes- ease of navigation- better office application support as a BYOD itemCons:- lack of root directory access(former Android user)- higher price

Reviews.Title: Use it every day
Reviews.Author: Daniel Fay
Reviews.Content: What is not to like about a Retina display iPad with plenty of storage, features, and good battery life? I feel that I don't need to write a full review on an iPad... those are all over the web. My only comment is about the Lightning port. While it is a good technological advancement over the old 30-pin Apple connector, it is hard to "find" in the dark and of course the limited accessories is annoying. But can't hold much of that against Apple. They couldn't keep that old connector forever.

Reviews.Title: ipad review
Reviews.Author: MKC
Reviews.Content: Loved it.. had To return only because we needed wi-fi + Verizon.  Loaded it up with games already purchased and other personal info but very easy ti remove all data before returning.  Will definately purchase another ipad!

Reviews.Title: Nice product.
Reviews.Author: eaglesfanbc
Reviews.Content: Love the iPad. Really wish there was more space available. M m m m m x x x x x

Reviews.Title: The ultimate!!!!
Reviews.Author: antoine dulin
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product to everybody..... This thing is fast accurate and very user friendly. I am glad i purchased this ipad.

Reviews.Title: IPad
Reviews.Author: Elly
Reviews.Content: Love my new iPad.  took a bit of getting use to, as I am a PC Windows user.  when I found the user guide, it was a piece of cake after that.  It is lightning fast.  wouldn't give it up for anything.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4
Reviews.Author: Dustin Buchanon
Reviews.Content: Love the iPad 4. The battery life is very good, I can be on it all day or even two days and still have a good charge.

Reviews.Title: You can not find a better tablet
Reviews.Author: FDupback
Reviews.Content: The IPad still maintains its rank as the best tablet available. I have searched for comparable android tablets, but no one has taken it to the level Apple has. The battery life, countless apps games and things you never knew you needed, including the fabulous retina display make the iPad number one.

Reviews.Title: I'm Lovin This Device
Reviews.Author: L.W. "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I bought this IPAD. My first Ipad.  I have a Kindle Fire and was considering the new Kindle Fire HD.  After reviewing for several days I decided on this IPAD 4.  I really love it.  It is fast...in an area where we still have slow computer speed.  I never used my Kindle for web browsing, it was just too slow.  I use the Apple Ipad to search the web daily.  Friends have told me they stop using their pc's but I don't think I will be able to give up my desktop.  However, I love this Ipad and use it daily.  It is just the right size for me; bright enough I can "see" it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nestor Reynoza "NJ"
Reviews.Content: Where I am from, it was back ordered for too long, and I got a nice deal from here. I have tried  the iPad 2 and 3, and there is not much difference between the 3 and this one, except that it runs cooler, and wifi seems to give less problems.

Reviews.Title: Another perfection by apple
Reviews.Author: Abhi
Reviews.Content: iPad is most elegant gadget I m having in my life so far. Apple is champion when it comes to user interface experience and iPad is no exception. Only small drawback I can see is that not all apps are yet designed to work on iPad though they work perfectly with iPhone.  But that has no relation with quality of iPad itself and hence my rating goes as 5 star

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: Cornelia S. Williams "connie"
Reviews.Content: Don't know what I ever did without my iPad.  I use it everyday and would really hate to have to be without it for any length of time.  It has nearly replaced my computer.

Reviews.Title: We love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: kristin anderson
Reviews.Content: It makes going away easier since we now don't need to lug around computers. Easy to use. Great gift from our family.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad But...
Reviews.Author: RusticBeauty
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad, but this bad boy has some weight on it. When holding it for a short period of time, I have to put down and rest my hands.. Other than that, what's not to love? It's a great tablet. It's fast, colorful, capable and fun. I enjoy it very much!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: M. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: I am still on a learning curve, looking for and finding apps which is why I did not give this a five star rating.  Does not work like a computer and it is hard to make the transition.  But so far so good.  This replaces another table I had purchased which was easily returned to Amazon with no problem (thanks Amazon, your the best!)I believe that once I have everything linked, I will love it more.  Have used it to read a Kindle book and watch a movie but I know there is much more that I can do with it.  Will post more once I have had it a bit longer.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it
Reviews.Author: A. Garza "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: If you're trying to decide between an iPad and a Kindle Fire .. I have both, the iPad is more versatile and you're not stuck with the carousel layout of the Fire. I'm not knocking the Fire it is awesome and perfect for Amazon Prime membership, but as far as versatility and ease of use, go iPad! This vendor shipped in a timely manner, well packaged. Happy buyer.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad. I have had it a few months now and am still learning all the things It/I can do. I was a little apprehensive at first about ordering this on line in stead of the store.It came in perfect condition and arrived early.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Habib H.
Reviews.Content: Superb...!It is even better than the iPAD3 ,It is definitely faster  and has a little bit better retina display than its predecessorBut it still gets HOT

Reviews.Title: I use this daily
Reviews.Author: ASMEQC
Reviews.Content: I don't really have anything to compare this to however I can say that I use it daily it is nice to be able to sit on the couch and surf the net. The freedom of not being stuck to a desk is great. The battery gives me plenty of charge I do not use it but a few hours of the day and usually only have to charge it every three days. The one thing I do not like that irritates me is that it is not flash compatible. This is the only notepad computer I have used so I really have nothing to compare it to. I would love to get my hands on something using the android operating system to compare. One feature this has that I use a lot is voice dictation which I am using right now it makes entering data very very fast. I do plan on purchasing set of speakers that is Bluetooth compatible, the sound on this is acceptable for general use but if you want to enjoy music external speakers are a must. Note this only has one speaker.

Reviews.Title: ipad retina 32gb, white
Reviews.Author: James R. Henry
Reviews.Content: seems to work just fine...takes and holds charge well.  bought a case/cover for it, too.  like the speed and gyro switching.

Reviews.Title: The nicest, and, very nice to own!
Reviews.Author: Carol Hubbard
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I'm purchasing it for my 66th birthday!! Who else is going to do that but me!!  I'm a gadget person and love technology. When I purchased my iMac (27") desktop - "wow" is all I can say.  It is beautiful. I have the iPhone 4S and I love Siri so I know I will enjoy her on my iPad as well.  The processor for my ipad will be like lightning and I look forward to using the iPad in a more leisurely way,  I've waited to get the newer model for the Retina Display.  Apple technology is great!!  My iPad is on the way Once I use it, I provide more feedback later.  Until then, I'm anxiously awaiting my new toy!Carol

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: marcomb17
Reviews.Content: Justo a tiempo y totalmente nuevo!!!!!!!!!!!!!RecomendadoEmpresa muy seria, sin ningún tipo de complicación.El producto tal como lo describen.Mi ipad 4 excelente!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: fausto
Reviews.Content: This ipad is fantastic. I can realized many works with the help of this product. I think made a good invertion

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: herve pugin
Reviews.Content: very good product, come in time at a good price. works good, I'm to buy this product. I will recommend it

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad!
Reviews.Author: A. Portsmouth
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad.  Love the improvements; the crystal-clear screen, the camera and the upgraded speed.  I've had a Kindle Fire and a Nook -- and there are dozens of other tablets available -- but NOTHING compares to an iPad.  Period.

Reviews.Title: I'm a convert!
Reviews.Author: John Donovan "jdonovan"
Reviews.Content: I've long resisted getting a tablet, thinking of it as an under powered, limited alternative to a notebook computer--and I have a very nice one of those (Sony Vaio). Well, I was wrong! For traveling--whether to the couch or remote trade shows--I'll be taking my iPad instead of my notebook; there's nothing I'll be doing away from my desktop tower machine that the iPad can't handle. The display is absolutely stunning, the speed is very impressive, and the whole user interface--while slightly confusing to a Windows user--is FAR superior to anything Redmond has turned out. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Apple Rocks
Reviews.Author: FrazierHughescom
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure who I was ordering from but the shipping was fast, the product is mint, and apple by far is the best tablet. Nobody compares. That's why I have two! - HughesitOrLoseIt.com?

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Bob "Bob McD"
Reviews.Content: This iPad is freakin' awesome!  My wife uses it daily for internet searches, downloading pictures, etc.  The graphics are incredible

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Denise Wiltjer
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad it beats out all the others such as android. I highly recommend it. It's better than any others

Reviews.Title: The Ipad is great
Reviews.Author: Anthony A Boccaccio
Reviews.Content: I held off buying this until the 4th generation.  I LOVE it.  And the company that send it to me was great!

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Francisco A Pineda R
Reviews.Content: Everything Was fine thanks, all the ítems arrived no timé and complete, the ítem is beautiful. . . . .

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: pacifican
Reviews.Content: SUperior design quality, internet browsing is faster than any other device in our house.I wish Apple would come up with better Maps app. No doubt it is coming.

Reviews.Title: Great product, nice packing fast deliver
Reviews.Author: Jose Acosta Jimenez
Reviews.Content: Product came great shape. Soo fast! Love it, I change to Samsung tab for while couldn't stand it. Love to be back :). Got it when it was 625 $ cheaper than order from the apple store :) since tax in here is soo high :(

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Debbie Boone
Reviews.Content: WEll worth the money and the picture is so clear....fast, and keeps a charge a long time..love love love it..

Reviews.Title: I've been missing out
Reviews.Author: CheeryLB
Reviews.Content: For so long I have been against buying an iPad. I have a 2007 desktop that runs Windows (which I recently ditched for Linux Mint) and it has always been my workhorse. I do a lot of graphic design work, school essays, and quite a bit of writing as a hobby. Last year I purchased a Samsung Galaxy Tab 7 inch and still like it for the most part, but even I--a "no knowledge with a mac" person--must admit the tab and other devices like it don't come anywhere close to the complete experience with the ipad. My main reason for not buy this has been because I had never really gotten my hands on one up close. Then one day my son walked in with one, and I was blown away by the ease of use combined with applications that work so naturally. I spent hours upon days tweaking the galaxy tab and fighting notifications. None of that with this device. It's smooth, durable, and brilliant. I also purchased a Smart Cover which works just fine but I might end up getting one of the clamshell style cases for use as a laptop when I'm out and about. As I type this, the iWork suite is updating in the background and the lightning cable is connected without any slowdown at all. Couldn't get that much out of the android tablet. I am also using the Anker bluetooth keyboard and it works perfectly. If anyone out there is considering a switch from android to ipad, I suggest going for it.

Reviews.Title: Like it better then the Ipad air
Reviews.Author: Yankelovver "Jl"
Reviews.Content: Bought my wife the ipad air and was gonna get myself one but ordered the ipad 4 instead to save some money. Besides being heavier, I just like it better, don't ask me why. It's just feels so much more natural and I'm glad I bought it. If your torn between the Air and this one and a lil extra weight wont bother you. This is a much much better value

Reviews.Title: Glad I Bought the iPad4!!
Reviews.Author: WMR
