Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I'm a die-hard windows OS user and droid user. However, after doing much research and talking to other people, I decided to buy the iPad4 for a tablet. So far, I'm not disappointed. I will still use windows-based computers and my Samsung Galaxy droid phone, but I have to admit that when it comes to a tablet, the Apple iPad4 is the way to go!!! WiFi connection is never a problem, the OS is super fast, the retina display is awesome, the feel of the tablet is nice, the sound is okay, the camera takes high quality pics/vids, the battery life is long, and I love all of the apps that are available. Also, I'm in the healthcare profession and often need to reference medical information quickly, so having this tablet provides me with the ability to get information in real time (using medical apps) and/or record notes all while at the patient's side. Overall, a great tool for personal and professional use!!!

Reviews.Title: Still the best
Reviews.Author: Robert Buschkemper
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad and I am convinced (again), after shopping the market, it is the  best value for tablets on the market.  I also own a Kindle Fire and appreciate it, especially for reading do to its size resolution, but for all around versaatility, endurance and apps iPad is my tablet of choice.

Reviews.Title: Why so expensive?
Reviews.Author: Marek Zalewski
Reviews.Content: The iPads work better than most Apple products, but certainly are not worth the exorbitant price. Two good Android tablets can easily be bought for the price of a single iPad. Maybe not as good, but very, very close.Have used my wife's full-size iPad and sort of like it, but my first generation, 7-inch Kindle Fire is almost as capable and much cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Lois H. Gelbert
Reviews.Content: I am unable to give a report because of age and loss of memory because of a stroke.  I was not aware that I would have so much to do to make it enjoyable.  I was hoping to be able to read a book and apply what I have read.  I have the Dummy Book for iPad. It is great reading but I probably have lost far more than I thought I did.  I will not give up because I think it will help me if I can do a few things.

Reviews.Title: Ehh
Reviews.Content: I rate it 3 because, i use to had the itouch second generation and I loved it! It had lots of space! But for my christmas gift I got this iPad. First i was really excited! but then i realizd that you couldnt have much apps, it took AGES for it to be completely charged! and i just dont like it as much as I did with my touch

Reviews.Title: It's all the same
Reviews.Author: Hai Tran
Reviews.Content: I have the first iPad and now the this one and really there isn't that much difference between the two except the retina display. Another thing, if you think you want to use the iPad for your PDF files, think again. It's a lot more trouble just to load the files, not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Never had an iPad before - I love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Page
Reviews.Content: So, this is my first iPad. I had waited and waited until I just couldn't do it anymore! Plus there were so many fellow parents telling me about this great learning app on their iPad for their kids.... My 5 year old son loves it! I put a bunch of games and educational stuff on their and he tools around and really loves it! It is very easy to use, mine arrived nicely packaged and I was able to set it up immediately. I would absolutely recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Joni E. Barker "dimples"
Reviews.Content: Was debating whether to get ipad with phone plan, but glad we got just the wifi ipad. Most places now have wifi, the service plans for iPads are soooo expensive (and of course most wifi is free), and u can download or rent movies that can be watched when no wifi is available (i.e car). Plus u can download a wifi finder so u don't have to HAVE wifi to find places where wifi can be accessed.

Reviews.Title: Recent purchase of Ipad 128GB
Reviews.Author: Robin Breard
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my mother's ipad.  The ipad was delivered a day earlier than expected and in good condition.  The product itself is extremely fast and the transition from the old one was easy!  I have nothing negative to say about this product or this purchase, therefore gave it a 5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: All that I expected.
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: It's all we all know about iPad. Just a slim, elegant, and very great tablet. Apple delivers innovation once again.

Reviews.Title: This was a present and  she loved
Reviews.Author: Jose L. Martinez
Reviews.Content: Buy this for my. Wife at first I  was in dub but now. She like it  special  the camaraderie and the easy access to the web

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Kelley Wicktor
Reviews.Content: I ordered an Apple iPad, and instead I received a Beats Pro headset, I don't know if its just an amazon thing or if its their personal policy but you can't even contact them personally to tell them what happened, all communication is through email which makes it even more difficult to get them to right their mistake, i paid a lot of money on a Birthday present that almost didn't get here and than when it did, it wasn't what i ordered, I won't be buying from this seller again and I'm sure neither will the guy who's missing his headset...!

Reviews.Title: Supper great iPad!!!
Reviews.Author: flipb
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  Everything was in good working order right out of the box.  Amazed at all the features.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Robertjfennjr
Reviews.Content: I had a I-pad 3rd generation and it was stolen by a Thrifty car rental  employee in Key West Airport!! I purchased this and love it. The 4th generation is great. I would recommend  purchasing from Amazon anytime!!

Reviews.Title: The perfect fit
Reviews.Author: Del
Reviews.Content: This IPad has done everything I desired.  It is easy to use and  to download and read books on it which is the main reason I wanted it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Computer
Reviews.Author: James Whipp
Reviews.Content: I bought for my wife and she thinks it is just peachy.  It is replacing her old laptop and she learning how operate it slowly liking more due to it's convenience.

Reviews.Title: Happy with it
Reviews.Author: ROZARIO
Reviews.Content: This is my first ipad, so l dont have anyone else to compare with. By the way, l'm happy with this one. It's easy to use and very addictive... it's perfect to see my pictures and l have downloaded many free app too.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Carole
Reviews.Content: Exactly what we were looking for! No need for the newest model this is wonderful, new in the box, and arrived quickly. Kids couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great, great,....but....
Reviews.Author: Curtis K. Davis
Reviews.Content: Apple items are obviously great, but there is this one thing with the background photo being enlarged to something like 4 times it's original size, which doesn't allow you to get your favorite background in view. Other than that, Apple products are solid.

Reviews.Title: IPad 4th Gen. MD510LL/A
Reviews.Author: Michelle P Ellis
Reviews.Content: Wow, I have had my 1st laptop since 11/13/2006 until it died a silent death in may of last year, and my newest laptop since may of last year is getting heavy to haul around, I love the Retina display, the quick connection to wi-fi way faster than my laptop BTW,the ease of use, and the fact that is really lightweight I really like it very much! WOW.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Benji
Reviews.Content: great product great transaction top notch tecnology  easy to use  great app store  good support when needed  i recomend the drops and spills warranty

Reviews.Title: It is what it said
Reviews.Author: marebear
Reviews.Content: I've seen many other iPads since this purchase i know i over paid. My fault for not shopping around. But it's worked just fine. If over 600$ is fine for a ipad.

Reviews.Title: Still testing capabilities
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Works well, mine in wi fi and sprint enabled.  Sprint does not have unlimited data option.  I would have selected another cell carrier had I known and the limited data options are quite expensive.  Mass deleting of emails is more of a chore than it should be.

Reviews.Title: sent wrong color
Reviews.Author: Susan Lohse
Reviews.Content: When I reported this to the seller he simply said "oh well, that was Apple'sscrew up." Not too pleased

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Melissa F.
Reviews.Content: Great price, although the box that the ipad was in was dropped on the corner, and there was a small scuff on the corner of the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: M. Cornett
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a refurbished product based on the price, but as far as I could tell, it seemed brand new.  It was in the original packaging and was in flawless condition.  Like other tablets we have had, it seemed to take a few good full charges for the battery to keep a charge for a long time, but it works well now and the battery lasts a decent amount of time considering how much I use the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Superb device- great service
Reviews.Author: Spartan 6
Reviews.Content: As with all Apple products- superb device and function-- married this one with a Belkin key board- arrived early and in perfect condition!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Marilyn  Wirth
Reviews.Content: I just love my iPad.  The picture is very clear.  Reponse is quick and correct.  The help icons are easy to understand.  Marilyn W

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Came in perfect conditions. I didn't run into any problems so far. Easy to set up and I recommend this to anyone who what a tablet.

Reviews.Title: good one

Reviews.Content: i will like that, actually 4th is a little bit heavier, but it's an ipad.i love it so far.

Reviews.Author: ScaperGal "Farscape is still awesome.  Get th...

I'm slowly getting to know my iPad and working out how "Apple" works.  No complaints about the iPad to date.  Prompt shipping and arrived in near new condition.

Reviews.Title: Proven great product
Reviews.Author: Tim V.
Reviews.Content: I gave all 5 stars because it was exactly what I was looking for, at a decent price. The shipping was quick and the product was undamaged.

Reviews.Title: I love Apple products!
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: Excellent buy, for an IPad of this quality.  I bought two, one for my wife, and one for me.  This is an upgrade for me, and her first.  I know she will love having her own.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the iPad
Reviews.Author: Becky S. Curtis
Reviews.Content: This is my daughter's second iPad. We haven't looked into the AT&T; data plan yet. Works great with WiFi! She uses it often. Looking forward to checking out the AT&T; data plan; hoping it won't be too expensive.

Reviews.Title: Freaking Awesome!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jayr
Reviews.Content: What can i say it is an APPLE! Had a ZOOM it was great also. I couldn't pass up the price for a 200$ more 128GB compared to a 32GB ZOOM. Apps are not as much but iTUNES has all the apps i need so why do i want more?

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Eugenia Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It's been working GREAT since I bought it. True that it is a bit heavy, but that is a small price to pay for all that room. No complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the product. Came just as described and functions perfectly. Great price for a tablet that functions just as good as the new ones on the market

Reviews.Title: Perfect ipad
Reviews.Author: liang
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use ,Packaging and delivery are very fast, I am very satisfied with the shopping,It has been proved that ipad4 is a better choice for me Considering the price  Although I have ipad3.I'd recommend this product for those who haven't .

Reviews.Title: Gifts to Love
Reviews.Author: Donald E Geib
Reviews.Content: I purchased these as gifts as I love my iPad and knew. The people who received these would fee the same way. And by all reports the just love the iPads and tell me again,and again how thankful they are to have them.

Reviews.Title: Met my expectations!
Reviews.Author: Steven Mitchell
Reviews.Content: The transaction met my expectations and the price was good!No hassles and the product was new as expected. OK

Reviews.Title: Best tablet you can buy!!!!
Reviews.Author: tony9277
Reviews.Content: Best ipad you can by in my opinion besides the 128GB version in the same model. Fast, Beautiful Display and more apps than any other platform.

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Gregory Thornton
Reviews.Content: It was a birthday gift for our daughter, who tells us that she loves it, is using if for both personal and business (teacher) purposes/

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: Yen Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Nice upgrade to the Ipad series, but still the same thing as an Ipad 3 expect a little faster. If you have the money then go for it.

Reviews.Title: Love but wish it could hold a charge longer.
Reviews.Author: Beth Parker
Reviews.Content: Love this device for traveling. However doesn't seem to hold a charge for more then 5 hours. I bought primarily for use when I travel but couldn't use for entire flights (international)

Reviews.Title: Takes some time to get use to it.
Reviews.Author: vark
Reviews.Content: Takes some time, but learning along the way, it be super if it ( the instructions were written in a manual ) of how to use it, but u got to learn from the internet or good ole fashion experience of using the product.  I do like it, for the cost was a wee bit high.

Reviews.Title: THE PURCHASE OF MY APPLE AIR IPAD
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Denier
Reviews.Content: I am so very  pleased with my Apple ipad. It is everything I've read & heard about &more.; The screen is the perfect size for me and I love the quick start up.They have made a wonderful product which makes  using the internet a breeze..I just wish they would include a users manual with the product because there is so much more to learn about.R.D.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Tablet!
Reviews.Author: David Ellis
Reviews.Content: There is a reason why the apple ipad is rated the #1 tablet.  This product was easy to set up and a full charge lasts a whopping 12 hours.  I am completely delighted in this purchase and I will recommend it to a friend or relative without any hesitation at all. Although there is a learning curve to learn everything this tablet can do, this is undoubtedly the best tablet on the market and there is an endless list of things it is capable of doing. Reviews.Title: Fast, fast, fast
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: I have had an IPad 2 for the past 2 years, which I liked. I decided to upgrade, but did not see any great advantage to getting and IPad Air for the extra bump in money.  We live very rural with no internet access, only the 3G on the iPad. I thought the slow download on the 2 was because of our setting - videos were out, pictures took a long time - so when we got the iPad 4, I was pleasantly surprised!  We can watch videos, download stories and generally just peruse the internet while not putting it down and doing something else while it loads!  The picture is marvelous, clear and sharp!  I did not think that would be so important but does make for good reading.  Overall, very glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Temporary problems with iOS
Reviews.Author: mb
Reviews.Content: This Ipad 4 is my first Apple product. After opening the box and setting my AppleID, I downloaded a few new applications,just to see how everything works. However, I was greatly surprised by noting that none of these applications can beremoved in the usual way (by pressing the icon, waiting for an "x" to appear, etc.). I contacted Apple support; they explainedme how to remove these applications with the help of iTunes on PC. That was OK, but certainly I didn't expect that removingan application should be so complicated. Although the Ipad was declared as being new, I had the impression that somebody used it before and messed the iOS. Being rather disappointed, I start playing with the device for a few days. Not knowing what else to do, I decided to reset the iOS (iOS6 to iOS7). Surprisingly, that was a step that resolved all the problems! The Ipad started working normally, and I don't expect to have similar problems in the future. Nevertheless, such an incorrect behavior of the iOS at the very beginning was frustrating for a device declared as new. Now it works fine.

Reviews.Title: An amazing platform for browsing, media, and iOS apps!
Reviews.Author: C-Dub
Reviews.Content: I was slow to justify the cost of an iPad and despite being a long time fan of Macs, didn't really see the need for one. I found myself in a job where I am on very remote locations with quite a bit of downtime and finally decided that I could use one.I have been absolutely thrilled with this device. It is extremely stable, even with the new iOS 7 operating system. I am very happy that I chose the Retina model, because the screen is basically perfect. For everything from web browsing to watching Netflix, the quality of video and images is second to none.App performance on the iPad Retina is superb, and many of the iPad specific apps are simply mind-blowing, particularly some of the art apps like Sketchbook Pro and Procreate. I recently acquired an Adonit Jot 4, which is a pressure sensitive stylus that connects via Bluetooth, and it works like something out of the future. Just crazy good. For forum participation, writing Amazon reviews, etc., I prefer my laptop simply because I don't like typing on a touchscreen, but that's just my personal preference. I can get around on the touchscreen and if I really wanted a physical keyboard, there are several available. But that's not really what the iPad is all about. It's not there to replace your computer; it's a different type of device that excels at browsing and media consumption and is portable in a way that no laptop is.Though it takes a bit longer than I would like to take a full charge, the battery life is excellent, and I rarely find myself needing to charge when I am out and about.As a media consumption / web browsing device, the iPad Retina is ideal. The screen is so amazing that it is generally preferable to me over a larger computer or laptop screen for these purposes. I take a star off of my rating because USB connectivity would be REALLY helpful for those who would like to watch movies that they have stored on an external drive. There really is no reason that the iPad shouldn't have USB.I love my iPad, and it is so usable in this current configuration that I don't see myself having to replace it with the latest and greatest for many years.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4th Generation Review
Reviews.Author: Nadine Cummington
Reviews.Content: I love this new iPad, it is quick, seamless, and the retina display is wonderful! When I first heard about the Retina display, I was sort of shocked by it and a bit doubtful. I thought there was no way that they can make the display any better... but I was wrong, it looks better than any still photo! It looks more real, realer. It is absolutely amazing. I got the 16GB Wifi only and have not had a problem with it once. I did get this one since I was not interested in the iPad Air that they had coming out, and I already had a 7 inch Kindle, so I was not interested in the iPad mini that was already on sale.I do not regret this purchase at all, everything on it works wonderfully, I got a Fintie case for it that rotates which is wonderful, and I must say that this iPad is the only thing in the world that is as close to perfect as anything or anyone can get. Pictures look wonderful, games look fantastic, and The Cloud works very well on this device. There is no set up time, just enter your email and password (or make an account) and that is it you are ready to use/share on The Cloud.I have to say now after experiencing Apple and their products, I now will be purchasing all their products (the products that I need) so they can all work together and accommodate one another. Right now I have an iMac and iPad and they work wonderfully together. Syncing my PC takes a bit more time, but it does indeed work. Although it is not as quick or seamless as my Apple products syncing with each other, but of course they are using the same iOS, etc. so that is understandable.This device is a masterpiece, best little computer there is, and is a absolute pleasure to have.5 stars all the way!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Reviews.Title: This is just I what I need!
Reviews.Author: Alejandro V.
Reviews.Content: The quality of the item exceeded my expectations, honestly. As far the product itself, I really enjoy it everyday. I'm not a basic user. That is, I wasn't looking for a tablet just to surf the internet or listen music like many people do. They look for all these expensive items, and never use all its potential. An iPad is a real powerful tool. You can automate tasks, help you organize yourself, save on text messages, calls, learn through downloadble apps, etc. All this in a single item. If you're looking for a tablet to just surf the internet, listen to music, facebook, just buy something else. The power and potential of the iPad doesn't deserve to be on standby forever.

I love the IPAD...so easy to,use but I am a little prejudice when it comes to Apple. We have IMACs..Air Books..mini IPads..IPhones..IPODS...what's not to love!???????

They keep telling me that all my credit cards are not valid in Italy. I have been living here and using Amex and Visa, both debit and credit cards for seventeen years. They refer me to my card providers and the card folks say they don't understand the problem. What good is this wonderful machine if I can't get Itunes to let me use my account?Norman Rhoads

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long

Reviews.Title: Great but beware
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: After three attempts I think I finally have a good ipad.  My first one the forward camera stopped working and I had to send it back.  The second one came from the IPADSHOP fulfilled by Amazon and when I checked the warranty it was used and only had 6mo of warranty left.  The box was wrapped in plastic to make it look new but was obviously not the same plastic that comes from the factory.  I have read of others having the same experience with the ipadshop.  So, google apple warranty check and check your serial number to make sure it is a new one. Amazon was great as usual and I had no problems returning the defective one and the used one.  They even waved the shipping on the third because of what happened.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It's the original touch screen tablet. Enough said, right?
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The 4th generation iPad is an iPad - that's enough to get the point across, right? We all know the iPad is the touch screen equivalent of the gold medal - others have come & gone, but it's still what every other tablet is compared to. Regarding this model, the only major difference between the 4th generation & the 3rd is a more powerful processor, but the amazing Retina screen remains the same - & as someone with a 2013 Macbook Air too which doesn't have a Retina display, the Retina screen is quite a difference.  I use my MA more for computing, while the iPad (to me) is more of an entertainment device - & its screen is definitely perfect for it.  Pixelation is all but a thing of the past with this baby!  Overall, I use this for Netflix & YouTube (& occasionally checking email, Facebook, etc.), but really, for a tablet & everything that goes with that, the iPad is everything you could ask for.

Reviews.Title: Has worked perfectly since purchase....
Reviews.Author: Gary J "Travel Junkie"
Reviews.Content: There were some negative reviews of this vendor. One particular series of highly critical reviews really made me wonder if I was getting into trouble buying the newest iPAD from this vendor. The price was roughly $120.00 less than Apple's price. So I was apprehensive until the tab arrived. The tab came in unopened original packaging, arriving on time and in good condition. I own two iPad 1s and an iPAD 2, and now this iPAD with retina display. They all work just the way they should. The screen is a nice improvement. This iPAD is so thin that it is easy to misplace if you don't have it in a more bulky case (which I have now done). I am very happy and impressed with both this iPAD model and with the vendor that I purchased it through. Cant complain at all.....

Reviews.Author: J. Hanks
Reviews.Content: This is an iPad.  It works wonderfully as such. It makes for a lousy Android tablet. It has good battery life, but is not a good replacement for batteries generally. The retina display is crisp, but compares unfavorably with a frosty autumn morning. It's too heavy too be a replacement for your kindle, but would be a wonderful alternative to avoid carrying around a complete encyclopedia. If you like Apple products you will love it. However, I do not recommend baking it into a pie.

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my iPad  there is a lot i need to learn  It is great and I am looking forward to learn a lot

Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Title: Good product but no WOW affect

Reviews.Content: Surprised at my expected response from this product.  Sometimes when I swipe on the lower part of the screen the pages do not advance, I have to move slightly higher to get the pages to turn.  I expected more i guess.

Reviews.Title: Yes Love is the word :)

Reviews.Content: This 128GB iPad has been totally enjoyed by my son, I gave it to him because he would use my corporate iPad endlessly and you know  I needed it too.My son is autistic and this device keeps him focused and gaming for now.There are apps for speech games that I will load for him as we go forward.I would recommend this iPad to all people of earth.Thank You

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display

Reviews.Content: I did not have tothink too much about this.  I got an iPad six months ago and my wife wanted a similar one.  Wish I couldhave kept this newer version.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: M. Klinker
Reviews.Content: had purchased a kindle fire hd 8.9 because of the good ratings and it was about 200 less than the ipad each with the 32G memory.  I used it for about 2 weeks.  I found it not as intuitive and the learning curve, while not bad, was a bit more cumbersome to learn to use.  Also it was one more operating system I would have to understand and use. I have an iphone 5, which replace my 4.  The iphone is easy to use, all kinds of apps (though I dont use many, its nice to know they are available).  I have handle the ipad before from relatives etc and they seemed nice and all, but not much different  from the iphone and wondered why the fuss.  At the time, I just couldnt see spending the bigger bucks for the iPad.  I found out differently.  While the Kindle does everything it says it does,  I returned it and ordered this ipad.  I feel now that it is definitely worth the extra.  It has the same sharp image with the retina display as the kindle and I would say even better.  Since I travel a lot and have satelite for TV at home, I use a vulkano (like sling box) to view my DVR recordings and live tv stations from home.  The Kindle did an OK job, but the iPad is superior with that task.  the app for kindle worked, had to pay extra for it and the operating system handled it OK but every 30 to 40 minutes it would drop the connection.  The ipad app was free and rock solid, so far.  I had used the iphone for several years, and using the iPad is as comfortable with familiar icons and function.  It has a little larger screen, ease of use, more apps, and accessories than kindle which made me spring for the extra dollars.  I am very happy with my decision.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: This is probably one of the best products I've ever bought. I wanted something that was lightweight and portable, and would replace my bulky laptop. This definitely is that. I was a little worried about having to pay for the apps, but there are tons of free ones out there. The only con i have is the keyboard. It's very tedious. If they put a regular keyboard on it, though, it wouldn't be the same product.  I would buy another one in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Ahead of time

So i took the plunge. I was not disappointed, but what really amazed me was amazing the web(facebook, internet reading etc...) look on this device. it is crystal clear and so much easier on the eye than my laptop or iphone. it's literally the perfect size. photos look exactly like what they are supposed to look like. I also love this model as it's the "budget" model with the smallest hard drive and no phone service. i just hook it up to wifi and i'm set. Also i don't need a lot hard drive space as i'm not really storing anything on it, just accessing the web.

Reviews.Title: Sorry, I will gave amazon 5 stars.
Reviews.Author: Jan. w "Jan. W."
Reviews.Content: I ordered an ipad 4 16gb wifi, but I got one that was an ipad 3 16 gb.Yes, I bought from amazon warehouse deal, nearly $400, but Ipad 4 is an ipad4 , you can not ship another one to replace it?I did not know about the different between 3 and 4, but my daughter knows them very well, she showed me the youtube,the physicaldifference about ipad 3 and 4 is the connection cable, that is why I post my review here, just be careful !!!when you receive any ipad from amazon, make sure, you got what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: At this point I have to rate this product a 1 because after TEN HOURS of charging it wont work.  Not with the "on/home" button trick, nada.  All I ever got on the screen was the low battery symbol when I first plugged it in and now nada.  Very disappointed and now have to go through the ordeal of returning it when I really do not have the time as this was purchased using a grant and I have less than a month to show success with students using it or it comes out of my pocket.  Joy.

Reviews.Title: Reasons I don't like iPad
Reviews.Author: M&M; "MyTrueComment"
Reviews.Content: Tablets are now better and better.  When iPad 2 came out, it was good.  iPad 4 spec was appealing.  However, I found there are some issues on iPad 4.1.  Heavy.  It is as heavy as 7 inch blackberry playbook.2.  It has been like that on setup.  You need iTune or wifi.  I don't have a Windows PC or Mac, and I need mac address to connect to my router.  How can I do it?  Apple did not think about this problem.3.  No setup guide, not a sheet of instruction.4.  Not to mention the price cost more than others.I have not connect the tablet yet.  Probably let me kid connect to his iTune and get the Mac address.  More to come.I have the ASUS tf700, and I like it a lot.  My opinion, it is better than iPad.

Reviews.Title: I am not sure whether I should rate it as 1 star, but
Reviews.Author: Xuebo
Reviews.Content: The fact is that I bought this on amazon as a gift to my wife as a bday gift. I ordered it on Monday night, it arrived on Thurs afternoon. Slightly slower than what I expected (I am amazon prime, so I have 2 day delivery free). But that is ok.The product was delivered in sealed condition with "original" package ---- at least I could not find any sign of previous usage or anything. Everything so far is so good.Then we started to initialize this Ipad. It gave me black screen for a short time, which I thought it was just normal --- probably it was loading something. And after that, it seemed to be normal all the way to the end of the setup phase. The next thing we do is to download google Chrome on it. It briefly showed a "shaky" "blurred" screen for a second or so. And then back to normal.Then we started to explore its functionality like taking pictures etc. The frequency of "shaky" screen by now increases. Then we tried to download some free games. After we downloaded the first free game (I do not remember which, our purpose was just testing) app, it went black. This time for 15 minutes or so. This time, I do not think it is normal any more.But after that, we were able to restart it. Just to find that it is now a norm of showing shaky screens all the time. And then we were browsing to find apple support using it. It is then the whole thing died. It won't come back any more. So we had to send it back.I do not know who I should blame the problem to, or just unlucky to hit this one.

Reviews.Title: UPDATED 09-24-2013 came with a screeen scratch and problem with with iIOS 7
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia CCS-400097
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars. But even though the Amazon Market Place's packaging for shipment was as good as required for shipping and delivering this type of merchandise, and that the Apple iPad factory box was undamaged, both wrappings intact and unopened, the iPad screen came with a noticeable two centimeter hairline scratch on top center, right below the camera lens. The scratch was visible through the factory envelope-like cellophane wrapping around the iPad itself. That type of scratch, could not had happened at the seller's warehouses, nor during transportation/delivery because it requires direct contact with the screen to produce it and as I explained the delivery package and product box where undamaged and unopened, so responsibility lies with manufacturing facility during or before final boxing of the iPad, which says a little of quality assurance and control in this case. That is, I do not blame Amazon nor the seller for the problem in this particular case (first time ever).That aside, the new iPad is working nicely and has a great retina display (colors, graphics, resolution...) and great speed. But I still will not give it the fourth and fifth stars, because contrary to what I'm used, and expect, to get from Apple products, this one didn't have that mint condition look that I expected from and Apple's new item. Instead of going trough the process of returning with all the time delay and implications (customs in my country for once)I installed a anti-glare/mate screen protector to "hide" the scratch, which somehow defeats the purpose of the great retina displayIMPORTANT UPDATE: IOS 7 have a feature that cannot be turned of, which verifies that the Lightning connector is certified by Apple, and as soon as I update to IOS 7, and connected my iPad to be charged with the Lightning connector that came with the iPad in the original, brand new, sealed and unopened factory box I got a pop up display that stated that my iPad connector isn't certified and my not function properly with my iPad. I reported this to apple via chat support and the agent told me, after running an online diagnostic, that my device and connectors were new and that it was a glitch in the IOS 7 verifying routine that would be fixed on a next release (update of IOS 7), so I dismissed (every time) the message and charged my iPad without problems. But that was until today, after connecting the new iPad with the supposedly original Apple lightning connector and receiving the  warning message, the iPad stop charging after reaching 27% charge. Beware, either don't buy this model or wait until Apple issues some kind of correction or update removing that verifying routine from IOS 7. Right now for me, living outside the US this is a disaster, returning the device, for me is not an option. So I will have to take my iPad to a Venezuelan authorized service center, testing and probably buying a new "original" lightning connector, cause if I buy the Apple care plan in the US It won't be applicable in my country.

Reviews.Title: This bad boy rocks!!!!
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: Everything good about this device which you may have heard by now is total truth.  I bought this exact model yesterday and I have just one problem.  I can't put it down!I did a side by side comparison with my old iPad and it's like holding a rotary phone next to a smartphone.  No comparison.  Until I started using this new model yesterday, I didn't think I was missing anything but I was wrong.  So what are you waiting for?  Go buy one and see for yourself!Setup took no time because I regularly use iTunes and was able to replicate all the contents from my old iPad to my new one.  I think my hubbie might have to have one too so he can enjoy it once in a while.  Prying it out of my hands is outta the question.  :DI recommend a Satellite wireless external Hard Drive and a leather cover with pro Bluetooth keyboard and a 2 yr extended warranty.  I figure by then, there will be something new to buy anyway.I might just go back to reading books now too.  Any excuse to use this baby.  ;)

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: What can I say...great product. I'm not a very techie person but the iPad is user friendly, light, and has a great battery life. The display is crystal clear. I did have to update the software when it arrived because the camera and photo app would not work. I was ready to go the Apple store for them to trouble shoot it but my friend figured it out first.

Reviews.Author: js
Reviews.Content: The box showed the latest iPad A1458 but the older model was in the box (A1416) along with the older style 30-pin connector.  Sending back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: So  DONE apple products
Reviews.Author: KEK
Reviews.Content: It is not the iPad as much as the apple os updates which keep messing up my iTunes and songs.  I have purchased and extensive library of songs and the past two updates have caused the songs to no longer be found showing them as not available on my iPad but trying to direct me to the cloud.  I think this is apples way of trying to force customers to pay for their cloud space which I am not interested in. It took me Hours to fix it the first time and it has happened again. Since I have all my music also on a backup drive... It is time to try a new tablet and no more apple for us.  Apple support is no help.  We are now looking at a galaxy tab and will go for that and drop all apple products.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade experience
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: I bought the first iPad when it debuted a few years ago and it has gotten heavy use by my wife and son ever since. A few things happened recently. I bought a 13" MacBook Pro, but I haven't completely transferred iTunes from my PC desktop to the MB. That said, when I received this iPad 4 as a gift, I let it sit in the box for a few days while I thought about how I would transfer iTunes to the MB and start the new iPad with a fresh sync. Well, I scrapped that idea and opened the unit anyway. To my surprise, the cloud service automatically copied the apps, calendar, contacts, bookmarks etc to the new unit. I can not describe clear enough what a relief the setup was.I am super happy with this product. The retina display is nice, the speed is very good. I'm happy that all of my computing is so much easier the more I have integrated my data into this Apple world. I have used PC's for over 20 years and have never particularly liked Apple. I only wished I had moved over sooner.

Reviews.Title: So far I am happy with my pleased.
Reviews.Author: buddy d
Reviews.Content: I received the IPAD it was fairly easy to be up and running.  I really enjoy using it my computer was an XPERIA so needed to be replaced and so I am happy

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Lochthyme
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4s which I use to take photos.  I then will switch over to my iPad to edit some of them for the convenience of being able to see them better....like the large size screen.  Plus some terrific art apps available for the iPad.  I like the large size, the apps available and the retina display.  If you are looking for a tablet the iPad is a terrific choice especially for those who like to do art.  Whether it be drawing, painting or photography.  Lots of terrific apps out there to meet your needs.  Nice size for working on...not too small. Reviews.Title: Simply the best tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: AppleSaucer "Paul"
Reviews.Content: The spectacular 9.7 inch Retina Display in Apple's full-size iPad is now matched with a custom System-on-Chip (SoC) that has the graphic muscle to take full advantage of its capabilities. The screen on this iPad is incredible! It totally blows away my HDTV.The 4th generation iPad also offers an overall speedier response than the 3rd generation model, along with the tiny new Lightning connector instead of a traditional 30-pin type. If you have a lot of peripherals that fit the older connector, you will need to a buy an adaptor if you want to keep using themI find myself using the iPad for roughly 80% of the activities that I used to do on my laptop. It is now my first choice for web browsing, and it is great for reading e-books. And it is more and more often my preferred way to watch movies and TV programs.Before buying, I compared this iPad to other high-quality tablets such as the 10-inch Nexus. As far as the displays go, the iPad was the clear winner. If the quality of the graphics is high on your list of priorities for a tablet, the 4th generation iPad is far and away the best choice.

Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I have used the previous generations (I work in IT). The retina display and thee processors (central and graphics) are awesome. The display is slick and smooth like water and amazingly clear. The response time is awesome. Videos are super clear in HD and games on this thing rock! The WiFi speeds are great. I am also using it for GarageBand which is like getting a portable recording studio for $5. I have traditionally been a Windows/Microsoft guy, but this thing just blows me away. I have several Andriod devices, which are very good too, but what this does, it does at a level that is unmatched. If you're thinking about buying and haven't used one much, just do it... you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great for artists!
Reviews.Author: bwgray
Reviews.Content: All of the other reviews have already told you how great this device is.  It's true. When I bought this for my 8yr old, I thought I was just giving in & wasting money.  I couldn't be more surprised or pleased. In addition to all of the other uses, this thing is great to draw with.  I'm a hobby artist, & this is great to take around & sketch without looking like a nerd with a sketchbook & box of pencils.  I do have one gripe.  When adjusting brightness lower at night while using a reading app, the black background turns gray which actually brightens the screen. The white font also turns gray.  The effect is a brighter screen with less contrast.  Hey apple, give me a 4k canvas to draw on please :)

Reviews.Title: Grandma Teri

Watch out Jane Jetson!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: apollo
Reviews.Content: This review will be very brief and basic; there are other great reviews out there that really dive into the in's and out's of this particular product.I love it!  Just like my relationship with my smartphone, don't leave home without it.  Crystal clear on graphics.  Of course, this is my first ipad so I cannot really compare it on past experience.  Tons of apps, batteries lasts ok.  100% can last for about a day (I actually used it for about an hour every hour, and by about 9-930 pm, battery was at 15%.  Again, depending on what you are doing, it lasted me for about 2 more hours (I think).Price was great!  Seller was AWESOME (they actually gave me a cover for this ipad as a token of appreciation for the business).  However, with that being said, if you have kids that always run around, MAKE SURE TO INVEST on a more "military" style case.  If you call Apple, the only thing that they could suggest was..., well sir, just buy a new one??!?  (yeah, like I have $500 bucks, spewing out from my pockets.  My response; okay let me go to my money tree and pick some bills out, goodbye!  If you go to an electronics store, make sure to have at least $200 laying around.  I broke/cracked my screen after 2 weeks!  So needless to say, a case with something covering the actual screen, yes it is a must!  No flash, no usb port, but takes good pictures and speakers are good as well.Item was shipped fast, very fast!  Definitely ordering from this person again!

Reviews.Title: Getting better
Reviews.Author: S. Arbuckle
Reviews.Content: I returned my I-Pad 3 after a few days use and never knowing if I'd get an email I couldn't read.  I only use this I-Pad 4 for watching video or surfing the net and not even plugged into email except for online use.  My cable lets me watch its programs on it so also works as a 3rd HDTV.  For watching TV or movies its great and the better picture of the I-Pad 4 is more suitable than the 3 if you're upgrading or initial buy.  Another plus is it connects to the 5GHz band of my dual band router and rarely has a buffer problem.Apples constant upgrades every few months is a turn off to me and this will be a one time buy - same reason I bought two 3GS phones, runs the new software at a half the price of a new phone every few months.  Also have a Nexus 7 and Nook HD+.  No one table is a do all like my Asus 1215B 12" laptop.  What Apple lacks because of flash & software issues if I could only have one table - Nexus 7 or 10 would be my choice

Reviews.Title: Worst choice on digital devices I've ever made
Reviews.Author: Xiaotian Le
Reviews.Content: In the past three years as an Android user I always heard, and experienced that iOS is much more fluent, or smooth than Android. However, that's no longer true, at least when comparing iPad 4 to my HTC One. iPad 4 is just as smooth as HTC One, and is still laggy sometimes (For example the frame rate of some animation drops significantly). The screen is a bit yellow, and its overall performance is on a par with HTC One. iPad 4's hardware technically is faster, but no any difference is found on system speed so far. Therefore, iPad has no advantage over HTC One, except the much bigger screen.On the other hand, Android is of course MUCH freer and easier to use. The iOS and iTunes always takes me hours to do something that can just be done in three minutes on Android. (Copying pictures from iPad that was not taken as photos, etc)I was SHOCKED when I found I cannot install an IME or a system tool, cannot customize the system UI or configuration, and even cannot copy files from others' computer without logging into iTunes! These are untolerable. Jailbreak solves some of them, but no jailbreak is available for iPad 4 over 6.13 so far.iPad 4 is just a toy for those who don't want to manage it, but only use it.

Battery operating time on a single charge is extraordinary! Manual switches on the sides of the iPad are difficult to operate, especially with a cover on the iPad. The cost of a cover for the iPad is extremely high, and they are not well thought out designs. The iPad is not a replacement for a laptop, but it is very convenient for travel. I like the big screen. Safari, an app, is clumsy to use. Google history is much more convenient. The History app gives you excellent TV programing.

Reviews.Title: Only because of jailbrake I can say I like the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Javier Puche
Reviews.Content: Mac products are stylish and well made, but software is a limitation. This is my first mac product since I have an smarth phone with android and a toshiba laptop. Hardware on this Ipad has good performance, it has good quality screen and the processor is fast opeming apps and navigating. What I did not like is all the restrictions that one as an user has when interacting with another brand devices and even with file management. I am tech savy maybe what I am writing is not relevant for other kind of users, but I like to get full use of the things I buy. For example with ipad bluetooth sharing can only be made between mac devices. File management non existant, just media folders, among other things. This is what made me give jailbrake a try. After installing it and experiment all alternative apps it offers I felt l in heaven, now I could say that the Ipad was mine, it was freedom. If it wasnt for cydia I would have sell  the ipad for sure and go to a samsung tablet.

Reviews.Title: 내 항문 정말이 기술을 좋아
Reviews.Author: Pizza Cat
Reviews.Content: 내가 이걸 어떻게 설명해야할지 모르지만 당신은 자기 인식 소프트웨어의 첫 번째 종류처럼 사이버 존재의 비행기에서의 미래에 느낌이, 젖은 뇌 공간의 또 다른 경우는 진공에 빨려 들어갔다 라인을 제공 코드. 모든 너무 기술의 통합 엉망으로하고 그 이해 이있 . 우리가 너무 우리가 텍스트 문자 three hundred 선으로 제한 할 수 있습니다 인정하고 겁이 때문에 우리가 인정하기 꺼려 야 같은 규모는 동물 우리를또한 버락 오바마 제 남편입니다

Reviews.Title: Don't buy if you can't get wi-fi
Reviews.Author: Diane Garner
Reviews.Content: This iPad doesn't come with the ability to get internet UNLESS you can get to wi fi. Had I know this I would have opted to pay more and get one that does!!!

Reviews.Title: Just doesn't hold a candle to my Asus Transformer
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: No SD, microSD, no USB, no dockable keyboard that also charges the tableet when connected. I could go on but I don't want to waste anymore of my life on it...

Reviews.Title: You gotta be kidding me
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: $1400 dollars? I can think of some many electronics way under this price tag before making any purchase. Spend the money on something else and something else and something else and an ipad 4th gen with 16gb.

Reviews.Title: HATE IT
Reviews.Author: Sandra B. Oakman "newkayaker"
Reviews.Content: what else is there to say. To many steps to load anything; can't go back to a previous page easily. Hate it!!! Hate it!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: GernanDawg
Reviews.Content: My family owns 3 iPads and a Mac computer and all of them are about was useful as a Tandy Computer from 1982. You can't do anything with an iPad but play games and if you intend to stay connected to the internet you had better get a graduate degree in software engineering because the average IT Tech can't keep any Apple devices connected to a wireless network. Mean while I have several PC desktops and laptops that NEVER have any connectivity issues. Our iPads are useless and Apple does not have any idea how to make them not useless....so now we have 3 $800 Kindles readers with apple logos on them that aren't as user friendly as the actual Kindles. I have no experience with any PC Type tablets but I have plenty with Apples and I won't waste any more on Apple products I assure you.

Reviews.Title: A Bad Apple Just Fell from the Apple Tree.........
Reviews.Author: LynnLuv59 "Nancy"
Reviews.Content: And landed right on ME! LOL!What wasn't really funny is the fact that I purchased the Newest, 4rth Generation IPad, the 64GBS Version, White, Standard-sized, with the Retina Display screen, and Siri onboard; and I guess, ready to "speak", but I won't ever know now, as I am having to return it, and fortunately for me, through a 2nd Party Buyer. Why is THAT a "Plus", in my favor? Because another large, corporate entity, that DOES stand behind their customers, will be behind me on the return of this Defective IPad, and literally, right out of the box! The Second Party ALSO, has deemed it "defective", formally, which will help.In short, I charged this brand new, IPad, for 12 hours straight, and it only went to 83% battery charge. after 14 hours of continuous chsrging, from TWO different charging stations, ( I also have an Ipod Touch, but that's for later. ) it only reached 95% charge, if NEVER reached a Full Charge, and this is on it's first one! No "lighting bolts" in battery, for me to see! I have since packed it up, and am awaiting the "call-tag ALREADY marked as "defective" from the Secondary Partner with Apple, and then I am sending it back ASAP! whether the trouble is the battery, or something technically more involved, I am NOT going to be the one left hanging with it THIS time!Three months ago, I bought my first Apple Product ever, and it was the IPod Touch, also in White, and also the 64GBS-version. It also was my first mp3 player, but I waited more than 3 years to finally decide to get it, as I have had problems with JUST how expensive Apple Products are, but if they work well, after all, "they" are the industry standard for the best there is. PLUS, they DO have their own network, IOS, which was very important to me, as well, At any rate, I got the IPod Touch, and it took 3 times, AND a Senior Technician, to get me on-line with the thing, and I told him THEN, that it shouldn't have been that difficult to get it to sync with my in-home wifi. It hadn't been with my other devices, including my workhorse computer. They are supposed to be such "user-friendly", people, with a Customer Service Center, and assistants, that are purported to be the best in the world. That is what I have been told, what is advertised the world over, and I have had some friends who have gotten Apple Products themselves, down through the years, and they have sworn by them, mostly. I FINALLY decided to make the leap, and get the Touch. It gave me NOTHING but problems, also right out of the box, and they just started with the problems with the initial set up. There were several others, and within the first two months of owning it, it went into Repair 4 times in turnaround shipping, they had it in their possession MORE than I did! On the fifth trouble call, and me madder than a wet hornet, I FINALLY got myself a Senior Advisor there, who took stock of the several complaints ALREADY lodged, and documented, mind you, and got me a Replacement IPod Touch, and........ It worked like a charm, also right out of the box, and it still is! The thing was, you see, it wasn't defective in the First Place! It has been working just fine, since I was issued it, and thank heaven's for that Senior Tech, as I am NOT sure that Apple Care wouldn't have left me hanging in mid-air, with the original IPod Touch, and I really think that they would have. I have come around a bit since THAT experience about not only Apple's Customer Service, but also concerning Apple's Quality Control Standards! What the heck is up, with that?After that fiasco, WHY was I willing to buy the New IPad? Because it was supposed to be a "second computer/backup" which it technically can be, btw, businessman even use them. It also is very portable, and also supposedly, easy to work with. Of course, I won't ever know that now, as I am having to return THIS one due to defectiveness right out of the box. It certainly HAS had an effect on me, I am waiting until AFTER the first of the year, either in January, or even February, before I make another move about getting something for my computing needs, and choices. I WON'T go through THIS mess again, I can tell you that! Besides, what were the odds that the same type of thing would happen to the same person, with TWO DIFFERENT APPLE PRODUCTS? I thought astronomical, that's WHY I took the chance on the purchase of the IPad.Which only goes to show, there are "Bad Apples's that DO Fall From the Apple Tree", and sometimes, lightning DOES strike in the same place! My question in all of this remains, Apple, wha?????????LynnLuv59

Reviews.Title: Overrated piece of crap.
Reviews.Author: Cole
Reviews.Content: This is 500$, you'd be better off paying 600$ to build a gaming PC, this thing is overrated there is absolutely no visible difference between retina and standard, this chips on the body extremely easy even when it stays in a case 24/7, save your money get a good powerful tablet like an acer iconia, or a build a gaming PC for 100$ more.

Reviews.Title: IT IS TOUCH SCREEN
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I bought this product thinking it would be like a mac book pro. But know its just a tab that you touch.. i mean serious. how am i suppose to do serious work on this?

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: TheTheo
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't beat it.  It's nearly 1/2 the cost of the apple ones and includes protection for the back of the iPad as well.  It's not perfect, and I'm sure it'll wear out faster than the apple ones, but for 25-30 you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: fernanda giannini
Reviews.Content: ok, perfecty good, but unfortunately I recieved another charge on my credit card and I only bought this ipad retina.

Reviews.Title: What's the big deal with Ipad?
Reviews.Author: Randy J
Reviews.Content: Got my new Ipad4 today and it's ok, just don't see what the big deal about it is. Wish I had waited on the google nexus 10 32gb to come out.

Reviews.Title: I Think I should have been offered my choice of  no. 4 or no. 5 !

Reviews.Content: I no more get it and guess what..?  That's right a newer IPad comes out! That just don t seem right ,  I Think I should have been advise and given a choice, don't you think So?  Don W. Boucher

Reviews.Content: I received a call from the Columbia County Sheriff's office, Lake City, Florida telling me the IPAD I purchased was stolen and they wanted me to ship it to them

Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad but it gets toooooooo hot it burns my hand when I'm holding it. I wish I could return n get a replacement
